story:
Who we are… 

Suspension Coffee Roasters is a micro-roastery out of Lubbock, Texas. With over thirteen years of combined experience, our roasting team is dedicated to quality, education, and ethical sourcing.

The plan…

We love turning coffee beans brown, and we constantly ask ourselves, “How can we do it better?” For now that means getting a few, new vital pieces of equipment, a website, and a little funding to help us get into a larger location. At this location we will be able to test our products more accurately, house merchandise for home-brewers & businesses nationwide, provide call ahead/walk-in customer service, and have the opportunity to host trainings for aspiring professionals & coffee enthusiasts!

Stuff We Need:

  • Starting capital for new location!

  • Computer & printer

  • Coffee roasting software

  • Commercial coffee grinder

  • Sample coffee roaster

  • Marketing fees & merchandise

  • Packaging materials

  • Delivery vehicle

  • Website

With your help, our goal is to raise $13,000 in order to cover the costs! We sincerely appreciate every cent donated. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for allowing us to do what we love!


The Perks…

With a little help from our roasting team, Johnny Velvet Tees & The Art of Nik, we will be throwing out some awesome giveaways including:

  • Custom designed “Rock’n’Roll” T-shirts

  • Suspension Coffee Roasters T-shirts

  • Suspension Coffee Roasters Stickers

  • Fresh roasted coffee sent to your door

  • Printed artwork from The Art of Nik

  • 6 Month coffee subscription 

  • Our undying gratitude + hug and/or high-five



Flexible funding…

We chose “flexible funding” because any amount would help us continue in our journey. So, if we don’t hit our expected goals, our funding will go back first to the Indiegogo donors, the businesses that support us during our campaign, and to the most important points of our shopping list.



Special thanks to:

Johnny Velvet Tees, The Art of Nik, ZeeCO Productions & Aaron Travis Peters, Gatsby’s Coffeehouse, Ryan Giesbrecht, John Potess, Cheri Isett, Pioneer Coffee (Jiminey Fallin), Ama Martinez, and to you!

We couldn’t do this without y’all!

story:
Steun AZC-Alert in de strijd voor meer inspraak en een duurzaam en humaan asielbeleid

Missie AZC-Alert

Het AZC-Alert burgerplatform wil de weerstand en actiebereidheid van ontevreden burgers en vooral direct omwonenden kanaliseren en benutten om de besluitvorming en informatievoorziening rond de komst van een AZC serieus te beïnvloeden en waar mogelijk geforceerde plaatsing te verhinderen als blijkt dat er geen draagvlak is in de gemeenschap.

Wij strijden samen voor een beter en humaner asielbeleid, waarbij we begrijpen dat er mensen opgevangen moeten worden en opvang in de regio ons uitgangspunt is.

We willen graag benadrukken dat lokaal protest voeren belangrijk is, maar om grote veranderingen in het Nederlandse asielbeleid te realiseren, is nationaal protest voeren nog belangrijker.

1) Dit is wie we zijn:

Het burgerplatform AZC-Alert is ontstaan vanuit een kleine groep burgers die een losstaand protest voerde tegen de komst van een asielzoekerscentrum in hun directe leefomgeving. Het offensief leidde tot een gewonnen rechtszaak, waar de rechter echter toch besliste dat het belang van de asielzoekers zwaarder woog dan het belang van de omwonenden, ondanks hun gelijk. Deze uitspraak heeft veel losgemaakt en de noodzaak duidelijk gemaakt voor een platform dat opkomt voor de belangen van alle betrokkenen, niet slechts die van de asielzoeker.

2) Dit is wat we doen:

Inventarisatie van het draagvlak onder de burgers, een stem geven aan mensen die zich niet gehoord voelen. Informeren over de feitelijke impact die een AZC met zich meebrengt, en in het verleden heeft gedaan. Voor het COA vaak onwelgevallige informatie voor iedereen openbaar maken zodat mensen zonder de censuurmolen van betrokken partijen kennis kunnen nemen van actuele zaken die spelen. Zorgen voor druk op bestuurders zodat de negatieve effecten niet weggemoffeld kunnen worden en ze ervan bewust maken dat zij verantwoordelijkheid dragen en er op afgerekend zullen worden.

Voor meer informatie verwijzen wij u graag naar onze
website en ons online manifest. 


Wat is de visie van AZC-Alert?

Het doel van AZC-Alert is niet het stoppen met opvang van vluchtelingen, maar om samen met de gemeenschap en bestuurders te komen tot fatsoenlijke opvang en besluitvorming - waarin het belang van álle partijen wordt erkend , om zo te komen tot een positieve, duurzame vorm van opvang waarvoor draagvlak bestaat onder de burgers. Anders dan hoe het nu gaat: geforceerde besluitvorming met een vijandige sfeer en een gespleten gemeenschap als gevolg.

Primair is het doel dat Nederland zich oriënteert op opvang in de regio, waaronder rijke Arabische oliestaten. U moet dan niet denken aan UNHCR tentenkampen, maar aan fatsoenlijke opvang.

Secundair dat burgers worden betrokken bij en eerlijk voorgelicht worden over de komst van een asielzoekerscentrum. Wij zijn niet tegen de opvang, maar we wensen dat burgers directe inspraak krijgen. Nu worden zij vaak geïnformeerd via de lokale nieuwsmedia.  

Met uw steun kunnen wij onze organisatie verder professionaliseren en op een effectievere manier de strijd met het COA en betrokken bestuurders. Het opgebrachte geld zal besteed worden het organiseren van een daadkrachtig verzet tegen het huidige asielbeleid. 

Verder kunt u o.a. denken aan:

  • De kosten van onze website en het onderhoud daarvan
  • Campagnemateriaal en drukwerk-kosten
  • Beveiliging van onze website
  • Juridische ondersteuning
  • Het opstarten van een stichting
     

Het asieldebat
Het asieldebat in Nederland én Europa lijkt op slot te zitten. Wij willen mensen laten inzien dat er wel degelijk oplossingen zijn voor de huidige asielproblematiek.
Mensen lijken vaak niet te beseffen dat de komst van een asielzoekerscentrum slechts het begin is van de asielproblematiek. 


- Verzet tegen het huidige asielbeleid is van belang voor iedereen die onze identiteit, leefbaarheid, veiligheid en welvaart als Nederlandse gemeenschap met hart voor zij die in moeilijkheden zitten wil zien voortbestaan. Het destructieve asielbeleid zorgt ervoor dat gemeenschappen door heel het land te maken krijgen met een verslechtering van die zaken en daarbij het wegvallen van onderlinge solidariteit alsmede het verlies van vertrouwen in de volksvertegenwoordiging.

- AZC Alert heeft reeds meerdere gemeenschappen bijgestaan in hun strijd tegen het COA en de schimmige geforceerde manier van handelen die zij samen met lokale bestuurders willen opleggen aan hun burgers, en met succes kunnen wij melden dat op steeds meer plaatsen burgers het winnen en er geen AZC komt door herhaaldelijk protest en een beroep op de lokale verantwoordelijkheid die bestuurders uit het oog verliezen zodra het COA om de hoek komt kijken.

- AZC-Alert heeft geen banden met de politiek en is een pluralistisch initiatief zowel qua ideologie als burgers die zich er bij aansluiten, de gemeenschappelijke deler is dat zij inspraak eisen in beslissingen die niet alleen hun leven maar ook dat van kinderen en familie direct en indringend zal raken. 


Risico's en uitdagingen

Wij zien gelukkig dat steeds meer burgers zich aansluiten en zich geen rad meer voor de ogen laten draaien door het COa en de lobby van de asielindustrie. Mensen in nood dienen geholpen te worden maar er is niks onredelijks aan om daar kritisch naar te kijken en te vragen om inspaak en een duurzaam beleid voor alle betrokkenen.


Hoe kunt u ons helpen?

Sommige mensen zijn financieel niet in staat om ons burgerplatform te steunen, maar u kunt ook onze campagne delen binnen uw eigen (sociale) netwerk.

story:
Short Summary 

Hello, my name is Nathan Birks. I have always loved nature and enjoyed gardening.  Following this passion, I earned a B.S. & M.A. in Biology, focused on Restoration Ecology. Professionally, I have worked in the fields of Water Quality, Restoration Ecology and have also worked on an Organic Farm. Now I am using my education and experience to revolutionize food production.

Why is this campaign important?

Climate Change and pollution are among the biggest threats to humanity.  How and especially where our food is produced is a big part of the problem.

Revolutionizing  the food production paradigm may be challenging, but  it can be done!  myTerra Farms is ready to set an example with innovative urban farming solutions!

How will your contribution help?
By contributing to this campaign,  you will help revolutionize food production in this country. Through combining controlled environmental agriculture,  permaculture, aquaponics, mushrooms cultivation and alternative energy production; myTerra Farms will produce organic mushrooms, micro-greens, fish, and produce, year-round, for the local Twin-cities area, with minimal environmental impact.

What We Need & What You Get

While myTerra Farms' ultimate goal is to revolutionize food production, with a zero waste closed loop system, the initial phase of this project is much more modest.  We are planning to start with mushroom and micro-green production and a modest aquaponics system.

For the initial phase of myTerra Farms, we are looking for $5,000 to purchase bulk starter seed, commercial grade mushroom cultures, growing supplies, pay initial farmers market and licensing fees and work toward USDA organic certification. 

My plan for myTerra Farms is scale-able. Whatever amount is raised with this initial campaign will be used to start the farm.  Any money beyond $5,000 will allow me to grow the business faster and expand aquaponic production.

What do you get for your contribution? 

Contributions of up to $200 will receive a gift certificate for 50% of the contribution amount.  Higher dollar perks are designed for chefs, restaurants and co-ops. These contributors will get a life-time 5%, 10% or 20% off of all purchases, plus a free sample of each product as it comes online.  This is a great way for your business or profession to save money long term, get in on the ground floor and support  a growing company.  This discount applies to all future products myTerra Farms will produce.  For Chefs, this discount will follow you should you change employment.

The Impact

The potential impact of myTerra Farms is truly spectacular.  Here are a few of the unique benefits to the myTerra Farms approach:

-Hyper-Local = limiting deliveries to 30 miles to reduce carbon emissions from fuel use.  Increases freshness and nutrient content of food.  Keep resource use local, i.e. not using water in drought stricken areas, like California, to grow food.

-Health Benefits = micro-greens are considered a super-food with 4x to 40x the nutrition of the plant at maturity! All micro-greens are grown with over 70 trace minerals, to add to their nutritional value.  Many mushroom species have anti-cancer properties, are full of essential nutrients and are high in protein and vitamin D.

-Hyper-efficient Growing Methods = Reduce water consumption by as much as 95%.  Produce more food in less space and in less time through aquaponics and controlled environmental agriculture.  Combining mushroom culture with aquaponics eliminates the potential pollution of mushroom cultivation (CO2) and eliminates the need to supplement CO2 for plant production.  Aquaponics combines fish production with plant production to mitigate fish waste and eliminate the need for fertilizers.  This technique also eliminates the need for soil, further reducing environmental impacts.

-Year-Round Production = by growing indoors, myTerra Farms is able to produce fresh local food year-round, eliminating the need to ship fresh greens from thousands of miles away in the middle of winter.

-Waste Reuse = up-cycling organic wastes from other industries as a growing medium.  Provides additional use for what is normally a waste product.  myTerra Farms then turns the growing medium into compost, preventing the waste from ever entering a landfill.

-Urban Renewal = using underutilized industrial space  and hiring local employees means more money stays in the local economy.

-Alternative Energy Production = our ultimate goal is to be a net alternative energy producer.  We plan to eventually produce surplus energy through a combination of wind, solar, and bio-digestion.  We will produce enough energy to run all of our lights and environmental controls and sell remaining energy back to the grid, further reducing our carbon footprint.  This aspect of the company will grow with time.

-Food Security = reduce impact of climate change and local/national disasters on food supply with local production.

By supporting myTerra Farms you will help change the paradigm of food production, help establish a company committed to environmental protection and sustainability and increase the supply of fresh local healthy food for the Twin-cities community.

Please... take a stand against Climate Change and for healthy organic local super-food by supporting this revolutionary start-up today!

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges with starting any new business. There may be challenges relating to the technical aspects of production, with scaling up production as the company grows, marketing the product and obtaining USDA Organic Certification.

Between my knowledge of biology, many hours of research and the many excellent professional resources available, I am confident that I will easily overcome any technical issues that may arise.

The business plan for myTerra Farms is completely scale-able.  We will start small and grow rapidly as funds and demand for the product increase. While rapid growth can be a challenge for a new business, the business model used for myTerra Farms should help minimize any disruptions.

With over 3 million people, the Twin-Cities metro area has a large demand for local organic produce, especially during the winter months.  Restaurants, Chefs, Co-ops, and Grocery and Health Food Stores are all potential consumers.  I will be approaching many of them as a part of this campaign.  myTerra Farms also plans on having a Farmer's Market stand at least one day per week to help market/sell our produce.

Obtaining USDA Organic Certification is often seen as a hard task. However, the myTerra Farms method is inherently organic and never uses any harsh chemicals or pesticides.  As we already use organic methods, obtaining USDA Organic Certification will simply be a matter of paperwork, cost, and inspections.  We plan to be Certified Organic as soon as possible. 

I am 100% confident that myTerra Farms will overcome these and any other challenges that may arise!

Business is already going very well and everyone just loves our products!  

myTerra Farms currently produces: Sunflower, Radish, Kale, and Broccoli micro-greens and Pearl Oyster, King Oyster, Lions Mane, and Shiitake mushrooms.  We plan to greatly expand our selection as funds become available.

Once we add aquaponics to the system we will add many more varieties of leafy greens and herbs to our line-up, as well as fish and possibly even exotic varieties like eel, sturgeon, shrimp and crayfish!

Other Ways You Can Help

Not able to make a contribution, but still want to support myTerra Farms and all the good things it represents?

Please spread the word about our crowd-funding campaign through social media and share our vision with your friends.

Look at where your food comes from, try to buy as local as possible. This is important even at your local co-op as much of our produce still comes from out of state.

Grow your own micro-greens at home.  They are a simple, fun to grow and are a great way to get children into gardening and to bring some fresh greens into your home this winter.

However you can help, I thank you for your support.

I am 100% confident that myTerra Farms will overcome these and any other challenges that may arise!

myTerra Farms currently produces: Sunflower, Radish, Kale, and Broccoli micro-greens and Pearl Oyster, King Oyster, Lions Mane, and Shiitake mushrooms.  We plan to greatly expand our selection as funds become available. 
Once we add aquaponics to the system we will add many more varieties of leafy greens and herbs to our line-up, as well as fish and possibly even exotic varieties like eel, sturgeon, shrimp and crayfish!
  Other Ways You Can Help Not able to make a contribution, but still want to support myTerra Farms and all the good things it represents?
Please spread the word about our crowd-funding campaign through social media and share our vision with your friends.
Look at where your food comes from, try to buy as local as possible. This is important even at your local co-op as much of our produce still comes from out of state.
Grow your own micro-greens at home.  They are a simple, fun to grow and are a great way to get children into gardening and to bring some fresh greens into your home this winter.
However you can help, I thank you for your support.

story:
What is Sun Lodge Farms?

Sun Lodge Farms is a new social enterprise joining together three diverse groups of people. We are creating a lifelong living community farm for people with special needs that will be supported by, and will support, the needs of 50+ seniors and young agrarians.

We are creating a place where people live, work and share. It's far more than living in community. Our plan is to support the 3 communities by building the farm into a sustainable and dynamic example for the world.

Sun Lodge Farms has also created an event site for festivals, retreats, weddings, conferences and corporate getaways. We are creating hiking, biking, cross-country skiing and horseback riding trails for visitors from all over the world.

The Background

“The earliest phases of the project began many years ago.  At first I envisioned golf courses, hotels, restaurants, building lots and other amenities that I knew people would enjoy in this beautiful place.

Then I met David...and everything changed. David has special needs. When I saw the issues that he faced and the real concern and worry his family had when considering his future, I knew they weren't alone. Something needed to be done.

I was also exposed to discussions within my peer group about worthwhile involvement for active seniors in an environment where mentorship and respect were a real contribution. As well, a growing need for low-cost living in a beautiful and co-creative community was greatly desired by the people I spoke to.

The third and final group came to me through meetings and discussions with young farmers who expressed a need for farmland to grow sustainable and healthy produce in order to ensure local food security and distribution. These passionate agrarians also wished to individually or collectively raise livestock and poultry.

I thought about the dilemmas facing these three communities and realized that we could bring them together in a co-supportive environment. This became the new dream; the vision of Sun Lodge Farms."

Dennis Bruneau, Founder and President, Sun Lodge Farms Inc.

What We Need and Why

Our goal is to raise $500,000.00 dollars to help us reduce interest-related debt and begin restoration of the "Central Lodge" which is to become the hub for all three communities. In addition, these funds will go to site planning for the housing communities, detailed specifications, architectural drawings, project management and numerous other details. These initial project plans and tasks need to be set in place in order for us to move forward.  The monies will also help us to further expand trails and event facilities on the farm.

Reducing the interest-related debt on the mortgage will ensure the future for all residents at Sun Lodge Farms, and enable us to facilitate the expansion and growth of the overall vision. Creating a safe and inviting environment at the "Central Lodge" will allow this vision to come to life.

With these goals in mind we have embarked upon our first donation-based crowdfunding campaign to help expand our reach, thus informing the world of our vision and raising funds to achieve our goals.

We'd like this story to continue. We are asking for your help to make it happen.

The Impact

Your contribution will help make a difference in the lives of everyone affected by Sun Lodge Farms:

  • People from all over the world with special needs and disabilities will come to visit or reside at the farm.
  • The local community and surrounding areas will benefit from locally-produced whole foods, contributing to the health, care and support of those who need it most.
  • Everyone will benefit from the economy the farm produces through farmers markets, festivals, retreats, and subsequent tourism.
  • The whole nation will benefit as it develops and supports sustainable community farms, just as other nations throughout the world are doing.
  • The world will benefit as we recognize that the need for community isn't limited to our personal neighborhood, but to our global future as a whole. What we do here impacts others on the other side of the globe, just as what they do affects us.


This is something worthwhile. This is something the world can help create. Sun Lodge Farms is a mountain farm located near a small community in the West Kootenays of British Columbia, Canada, that you can be a part of - no matter where you are in the world. A place to visit - to retreat - to contribute. It's a community for everyone.

Visit our website for more details, learn about the team, watch additional videos, and see the picturesque  views from the farm: www.sunlodgefarms.com

Challenges

A farm of this size needs volunteer help to replenish the land and expand on strategies and ideas. It also needs revenue to break new ground and deliver upon its potential. The reduction of interest-bearing debt is sound fiscal management. With reduced interest, the monies raised will help facilitate administrative and planning projects that will move us faster toward building the housing for people with special needs and for the active 50+ seniors who apply to live at the farm. It will enable a sound infrastructure to be created from which young agrarians may begin farming and raising collective or individual livestock. It's an idea that the world is ready for.

    How You Can Help

    Please spread the word. Ask everyone you know to ask everyone they know to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

    Send out links - available through this site - to your social media connections

    Thank you kindly for all your support.

story:
About Us 

As life long surfers, we have always been in search of the perfect wave. Being From Long Island we realize that consistency has proven to be a major issue. Between wind direction, swell size, tides, water temperatures, and crowds, Long Island is hardly a surfer's paradise. Our missions is to design, build, and successfully operate a world class surfing wave pool. This pool will be considered the world's best man-made wave and will be run as a member's only club. It will be built in an area that has a dense population of surfers, who do not get to experience world class waves everyday. Our goal is to open facilities like this one all over the country. 

         


The Wave Pool

When plan to use technology that will produce the best man made wave ever! Our pool will be very similar to that of the Ocean Dome featured in the video below.

American Wave Machines Is A California Based Company That Has A Proven Track Record In The World Of Standing Waves. AWM Also Builds Wave Pools. Their Wave Pool Is More Traditional In The Sense That It Is Shaped Like Any Other Wave Pool That You Would Find At A Water Park. The AWM Pool However Is Wider Allowing For More Peaks At A Time. AWM Has Told Us Directly That They Can Create A 7 1/2 Foot Barreling Wave That Breaks For 70 Yards. These Waves Can Be Produced Every 15 Seconds Leading To 240 Waves Per Hour. 

The Pool Will Be Outside, Open All Year Round And Heated All Year To An Average Temperature Of 65 Degrees. The Pool Will Be Filtered Using Salt Just Like the Ocean. This Will Allow For A More Natural Feel When In The Water And Will Eliminate The Chlorine Smell. 


The Purpose Of This Campaign


We are looking to raise at least $500,000 to help invest into the the initial funding of the pool. this money will be used to help with the initial costs associated with the start up of the company such as, advertising, deposit on the wave pool, website redesign, and legal fees. There will be more than one way to help contribute to make our dream a reality. The first option is to donate here through Indiegogo, by contributing this way contributors will receive the perks listed with each item, as well as the perks associated with the donations below each one. 

Challenges 


One of the challenges associated with this project is building a list of potential members. We have already started to do so through the contact page located on our website. This list will be used to show investors the demand for the project. We do not want to take anyone's money, therefore signing up as a potential member is free! As we build the list to 200-300 potential members and the project begins, then we will start to take deposits in order to hold membership spots.


Other Ways You Can Help


Currently we could use all the help we can get in growing our population of supporters. We are on Twitter as @LISurfPark and Facebook as Long Island Surf Park, and Instagram @Long_Island_Surf_Park. We need help attracting more followers, potential members and potential investors. If everyone could just spread the word about us to 2 or 3 people it would helps us tremendously.



All in all, with the help of donors and investors, we could very easily make this dream a reality. So why not help us out, we have some really great rewards for you!

story:
WHO WE ARE


Hi, we are Martin and George, brothers in arms as well as in real life. We just love gastronomy and the French one on a top of it. Take some time and sample a taste of French regions for yourself, you will understand.

Only last year came out our first French cookbook LE MOUTON (being French equivalent of our family name). We are currently preparing English edition being last step to our worldwide fame. Ha ha.

Now we are just within reach of our goal to open our very own great French family restaurant. This is what brought us to this point. So here we are


OUR GREAT NEW VENTURE

To feel like a French take some time off, open a bottle of good wine and put on some music
And let us tell you about our plans:

Why MULÉ? It's Czech pronunciation of French word moules for(and it means mussels in English).

Our classic musssel soup with cream and pinch of saffron

Our basic BRASSERIE menu will be the best of traditional regional cooking and MOULES BAR will bring you the best of Bretagne sea beds.

It took us a while but we finally found a place we wanted. It's a fabuluous 13th century building, smack in a middle of our city.

It's just the right place to have an old style French brasserie, all in wood and old brick, with shining brass bar tops. And waiters running around amidst a tone of French music and beautiful smell of mussels in wine, butter and croissants. Full of guests leisurly sipping pastis and waiting for their duck with oranges.

This is our MULÉ just about to be born. We love it.



Martin's chef special vol-au-vent with salmon and slow roasted garlic

                             A bit of luxury - foie gras terrine

                                                      
                                Perfection on plate - Duck parmentier

THIS IS WHAT WE NEED

With relief we just completed a building recontruction, we even have our shining bars. And where we would very much appreciate your hepling hand is furbishings and decorations as well as stocking up our wine cellar, developing new website and  most importantly, a marketing campaign.

Only with your help we will be able to accomplish our original dream to perfection, having a place withnout compromise.


WE ARE SHARING WITH NEEDY

We will send 10 cents from every and each euro recieved from you to the charity project "Lunch for kids". This is our way to get quality food to kids unable to afford a decent school lunch. Since food is our business we see this as the best way to help.

You will find current report at out FB & web page.

HUGE THANKS

And finally great thanks to all of you backers for your support and trust.

At last but not least, many thanks to our friends and families who  believed in us right through the project.

story:
Short Summary

Heart Land Prairie Cemetery will be the first all-natural burial ground in Kansas. A natural cemetery receives only un-embalmed bodies or cremated remains in biodegradable containers, buried directly in the ground without the use of steel, concrete or plastic vaults. We will be restoring the piece of land, donated by The Land Institute, to natural prairie, replanting with species native to the Great Plains. 


What We Need & What You Get

We’ve set our fundraising goal at $16,000. The bulk of funds raised will be placed in a Permanent Maintenance Fund as required by state law, the remaining used for a variety of projects related to the start-up. The cemetery has received non-profit status with the IRS and is designated as a 501(c)(13), a designation specifically for cemetery non-profits, under the name Heart Land Green Burial, Inc. Donations are tax-deductible. To request a receipt for your donation please visit our website at heartlandprairiecemetery.org and click the "contact us" tab.

  • Fun Perk: Folks donating $200 or more will receive an organic cotton T-shirt with the words "I can be buried in this T-shirt at Heart Land Prairie Cemetery"


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a financial donation, please help us make this project a reality by sharing it with your friends through social media and email. Thank you so much for helping us get the word out!

story:
OK guys!  The first campaign went great and you have helped us getting this thing started!  But we're not done!  So far you've helped us with securing the venue, getting our branding, securing certain presenters/performers but we still need your help.  Those presenters and performers are taking time out of their very busy schedules to come  be a part of the ODD Con Tribe!  In several cases they are travelling hundreds of miles out of state away from their homes and families, moving their schedules around just so they can be here to launch this event and that requires so much sacrifice on their part!  I should know!  I've been in their shoes!  They believe in this event and the least we can do is take care of them.  So with that being said this campaign (Part II) is to raise funding that will help us provide monies for their travel (in some cases flights), their hotel rooms for event, their food and meals, and to hopefully make sure they walk away with this with something in their pockets.  We all have to pay the bills they are no different.  Now just to give you a taste of who you'll get to see at the 1st Annual ODD Con Nashville...  what do you think about this list of names....  A few of the performances you will see...
Tuatha Dea, The creators of our Tribe, Celtic Tribal Gypsy Rock headlining the Weirdo's Ball!  Get ready to feel the Earth itself dance!
Celia Farran!  Musician/Comedian extraordinaire who if we're lucky will grace us with an appearance from The Trestle Foote Faerie!  Ladies you know what that means ;)
Black Sky Tribe.  A mainstream Hard Rock band based out of Nashville, TN whose music can be heard locally on 102.9 the buzz.  Not only are they super talented but some of the coolest guys you'll ever met!
Magnificent Light Entertainment!  Amazing flow arts troupe out of Nashville that will wow and awe you with their skills.  Though they are best known for their fire performances they will be sure to entrance audiences with their LED performances!
How bout Authors!  
Alex Bledsoe!  Creator of the Tufa, Appalachian Fae and inspiration for Tuatha Dea's newest CD!  Meet the man himself, grab a copy of his newest book and get a signature while your at it and get to know him at his panel!
M.R. Sellars!  Writer of the Rowan Gant Saga the acclaimed paranormal thriller series!  Talk about unique!  There's a brain to pick!  If you haven't read this series do it!  And don't miss out on his workshops and panels!
Christine Greyson.  Sister to Rebecca and Kathy and daughter to the infamous Mavis McGee.  All the way from New York to bring to us her real life travels about being a bohemian Gypsy!
Mavis McGee herself.  So many folks know who she is. She is forever immortalized in song by Tuatha Dea but there's so much more to that silver haired beauty than most people know.  Besides being the lady that gifted her amazing voice to her three daughters, she herself spent years as a bluegrass musician and writing poetry.   All the MacGregor ladies under one roof.  That is a rarity and sure to be interesting!
And Finally!  Our most recent and exciting addition!
Selena Fox!!  The lady herself!  Her resume is way too long to list in this brief introduction but most of you know who she is!  Civil rights activist, environmentalist, priestess, author, teacher just to name a few.  Down here and the South it is a rarity for us to be blessed by her presence so take the opportunity and meet her for yourself.  She will have her books, be doing workshops, and who knows what else!  
And there will be so many others to come!  We are not anywhere near being done with adding to this line up!  There will be more music than you can stand from all genres and workshop after workshop, panels with your favorite authors, musicians, and performers, vendors, meet and greets, get autographs, contests and just plain fun!   But in order for us to make this the amazing experience it is destined to be we need to be able to get those folks there and take care of them and also to continue adding to that list of awesomeness!  

Now in case you missed the first campaign let me tell you about ODD Con....

ODD Con... Original, Diverse, Different.  

Given the world's current state it is extremely important to show the world that we can coexist.  It's time to let go of the stigmas placed on us.  In keeping with that ideal... ODD Con is setting the stage for something larger... A future project called The Humanity Experiment.  A documentary about civil rights and the problems humanity faces today.  It is the hope that it will raise awareness and show the world we need to change.  A wake up call.  

As a contributor to this campaign you will make this idea a reality.  Starting a revolution in the hearts and minds so to speak!  Bringing us all together under one roof for two days of acceptance!  And how will we celebrate our differences?  How bout The Weirdo's Ball featuring internationally touring band Tuatha Dea!  Or show us your favorite game, comic or anime character in the Cosplay Contest!  Into the living dead?  Then get all gored up and enter the Zombie Pin-Up Beauty Pageant!  Wanna just shop?  Check out our insane variety at vendors row.  Music freak?  Stick around for all the live acts.  How bout the Artists Spotlight Gallery for local artists and craftsmen?  We should always show support for local art!  Don't forget about the many workshops, presenters and fan Q&A Panels with your favorite band, author or community leaders!  There are so many things to experience at ODD Con that we can't even list them all here!  So much is being put into this and with the idea in mind of bringing everyone together!  Lastly, your contribution will go toward bringing awareness to the The Humanity Experiment and hopefully gain support and sponsorship for the project.

What We Need & What You Get

Truth is it's impossible to know the exact amount we will need.  But we want to be able to bring the best to you.  In order to do that we have to secure the location of the venue and take care of our performers and guests who are there to share their time with all of us.  The money you donate will help pay the travel expenses, boarding, feeding and make sure they don't walk away empty handed.  After all they're all artists too and this is how they make their living.  They are giving us a gift of their talents, knowledge and time to be there.  This ensures we can do that.

But you won't give something for nothing... Perks will include everything from ODD Con swag to private meet and greets with your fav band, author or presenter, Autographed photos, free tarot readings and birth charts and at higher levels will also get your tickets and front row seating at concerts and panels!  Just check em all out!

If we don't happen to reach our goal all funds donated will still be put towards the event.  Basically, the more funding we get the bigger the event.  So if we don't reach our goal then the event will just be downsized.  Either way, ODD Con will happen.  If we are lucky enough to reach our goal... well... you never know what will happen!

Risks & Challenges

Being a new event we face many challenges.  One being that there is no funding to begin with.  No previous years income to put towards this years event.  No sponsor to help bring it to fruition.  So we need your help.  This event has the potential to be huge.  But there is always the possibility of failure.  But in order to succeed you must be willing to fail.  So here we are.  Asking... no begging for you to help make this a success.  This dream can be a reality.  

So Many Tiers!

Some of the items you can get need some explaining.  The Poster, t-shirt and bracelet are limited edition ODD Con items that are only available to contributors!  No one else will have these!!  Two meet and greets will be scheduled for both Tuatha Dea and Alex Bledsoe.  This is your time to just hang out and get to know how cool these people are or grab a moment to talk about booking them for your venue ;).  you can get a 1 hour photo shoot done whenever you want schedule with dark9 photo by Allison Wallace.  Autograph photos of Tuatha Dea, Autographed copies of Alex's books, even a Tuckerization in his next novel!  Bands like beer... well most of em... how bout access to the off limits hospitality area to sit down and grab a cold one and just be one of them.  Check em out behind the scenes!  You can get all access VIP action that includes reserved front row seating at panels, concerts and most events.  These tiers even include admission price for 2-4 people and can even include your hotel room!  You can even be one of our judges at the Zombie Pin Up Beauty Pageant!  There are so many perks!  and who knows we may even add more!!  

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you contribute or you don't please help us get the word out.  Share this link.  Tell your friends, family, co-workers.  And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
OK guys!  The first campaign went great and you have helped us getting this thing started!  But we're not done!  So far you've helped us with securing the venue, getting our branding, securing certain presenters/performers but we still need your help.  Those presenters and performers are taking time out of their very busy schedules to come  be a part of the ODD Con Tribe!  In several cases they are travelling hundreds of miles out of state away from their homes and families, moving their schedules around just so they can be here to launch this event and that requires so much sacrifice on their part!  I should know!  I've been in their shoes!  They believe in this event and the least we can do is take care of them.  So with that being said this campaign (Part II) is to raise funding that will help us provide monies for their travel (in some cases flights), their hotel rooms for event, their food and meals, and to hopefully make sure they walk away with this with something in their pockets.  We all have to pay the bills they are no different.  Now just to give you a taste of who you'll get to see at the 1st Annual ODD Con Nashville...  what do you think about this list of names....  A few of the performances you will see...Tuatha Dea, The creators of our Tribe, Celtic Tribal Gypsy Rock headlining the Weirdo's Ball!  Get ready to feel the Earth itself dance!Celia Farran!  Musician/Comedian extraordinaire who if we're lucky will grace us with an appearance from The Trestle Foote Faerie!  Ladies you know what that means ;)Black Sky Tribe.  A mainstream Hard Rock band based out of Nashville, TN whose music can be heard locally on 102.9 the buzz.  Not only are they super talented but some of the coolest guys you'll ever met!Magnificent Light Entertainment!  Amazing flow arts troupe out of Nashville that will wow and awe you with their skills.  Though they are best known for their fire performances they will be sure to entrance audiences with their LED performances!How bout Authors!  Alex Bledsoe!  Creator of the Tufa, Appalachian Fae and inspiration for Tuatha Dea's newest CD!  Meet the man himself, grab a copy of his newest book and get a signature while your at it and get to know him at his panel!M.R. Sellars!  Writer of the Rowan Gant Saga the acclaimed paranormal thriller series!  Talk about unique!  There's a brain to pick!  If you haven't read this series do it!  And don't miss out on his workshops and panels!Christine Greyson.  Sister to Rebecca and Kathy and daughter to the infamous Mavis McGee.  All the way from New York to bring to us her real life travels about being a bohemian Gypsy!Mavis McGee herself.  So many folks know who she is. She is forever immortalized in song by Tuatha Dea but there's so much more to that silver haired beauty than most people know.  Besides being the lady that gifted her amazing voice to her three daughters, she herself spent years as a bluegrass musician and writing poetry.   All the MacGregor ladies under one roof.  That is a rarity and sure to be interesting!And Finally!  Our most recent and exciting addition!Selena Fox!!  The lady herself!  Her resume is way too long to list in this brief introduction but most of you know who she is!  Civil rights activist, environmentalist, priestess, author, teacher just to name a few.  Down here and the South it is a rarity for us to be blessed by her presence so take the opportunity and meet her for yourself.  She will have her books, be doing workshops, and who knows what else!  And there will be so many others to come!  We are not anywhere near being done with adding to this line up!  There will be more music than you can stand from all genres and workshop after workshop, panels with your favorite authors, musicians, and performers, vendors, meet and greets, get autographs, contests and just plain fun!   But in order for us to make this the amazing experience it is destined to be we need to be able to get those folks there and take care of them and also to continue adding to that list of awesomeness!  Now in case you missed the first campaign let me tell you about ODD Con....
ODD Con... Original, Diverse, Different.  
Given the world's current state it is extremely important to show the world that we can coexist.  It's time to let go of the stigmas placed on us.  In keeping with that ideal... ODD Con is setting the stage for something larger... A future project called The Humanity Experiment.  A documentary about civil rights and the problems humanity faces today.  It is the hope that it will raise awareness and show the world we need to change.  A wake up call.  
As a contributor to this campaign you will make this idea a reality.  Starting a revolution in the hearts and minds so to speak!  Bringing us all together under one roof for two days of acceptance!  And how will we celebrate our differences?  How bout The Weirdo's Ball featuring internationally touring band Tuatha Dea!  Or show us your favorite game, comic or anime character in the Cosplay Contest!  Into the living dead?  Then get all gored up and enter the Zombie Pin-Up Beauty Pageant!  Wanna just shop?  Check out our insane variety at vendors row.  Music freak?  Stick around for all the live acts.  How bout the Artists Spotlight Gallery for local artists and craftsmen?  We should always show support for local art!  Don't forget about the many workshops, presenters and fan Q&A Panels with your favorite band, author or community leaders!  There are so many things to experience at ODD Con that we can't even list them all here!  So much is being put into this and with the idea in mind of bringing everyone together!  Lastly, your contribution will go toward bringing awareness to the The Humanity Experiment and hopefully gain support and sponsorship for the project.
What We Need & What You GetTruth is it's impossible to know the exact amount we will need.  But we want to be able to bring the best to you.  In order to do that we have to secure the location of the venue and take care of our performers and guests who are there to share their time with all of us.  The money you donate will help pay the travel expenses, boarding, feeding and make sure they don't walk away empty handed.  After all they're all artists too and this is how they make their living.  They are giving us a gift of their talents, knowledge and time to be there.  This ensures we can do that.
But you won't give something for nothing... Perks will include everything from ODD Con swag to private meet and greets with your fav band, author or presenter, Autographed photos, free tarot readings and birth charts and at higher levels will also get your tickets and front row seating at concerts and panels!  Just check em all out!
If we don't happen to reach our goal all funds donated will still be put towards the event.  Basically, the more funding we get the bigger the event.  So if we don't reach our goal then the event will just be downsized.  Either way, ODD Con will happen.  If we are lucky enough to reach our goal... well... you never know what will happen!
Risks & ChallengesBeing a new event we face many challenges.  One being that there is no funding to begin with.  No previous years income to put towards this years event.  No sponsor to help bring it to fruition.  So we need your help.  This event has the potential to be huge.  But there is always the possibility of failure.  But in order to succeed you must be willing to fail.  So here we are.  Asking... no begging for you to help make this a success.  This dream can be a reality.  So Many Tiers!Some of the items you can get need some explaining.  The Poster, t-shirt and bracelet are limited edition ODD Con items that are only available to contributors!  No one else will have these!!  Two meet and greets will be scheduled for both Tuatha Dea and Alex Bledsoe.  This is your time to just hang out and get to know how cool these people are or grab a moment to talk about booking them for your venue ;).  you can get a 1 hour photo shoot done whenever you want schedule with dark9 photo by Allison Wallace.  Autograph photos of Tuatha Dea, Autographed copies of Alex's books, even a Tuckerization in his next novel!  Bands like beer... well most of em... how bout access to the off limits hospitality area to sit down and grab a cold one and just be one of them.  Check em out behind the scenes!  You can get all access VIP action that includes reserved front row seating at panels, concerts and most events.  These tiers even include admission price for 2-4 people and can even include your hotel room!  You can even be one of our judges at the Zombie Pin Up Beauty Pageant!  There are so many perks!  and who knows we may even add more!!  Other Ways You Can HelpWhether you contribute or you don't please help us get the word out.  Share this link.  Tell your friends, family, co-workers.  And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
**SECOND UPDATE** 

HOORAY!!! Thanks to everyone who helped out, I can afford a mermaid fin! I actually discovered ANOTHER finmaker who makes GORGEOUS tails for $1800! I raised about $2000 total (including what I raised outside of Indiegogo) so I have extra to go towards better quality wigs and accessories! Thank you so much to everyone who helped out.. Your generosity is overwhelming!

**UPDATE**

Good news! I just booked a job that will help in paying off the tail tremendously! Everything I earn for it is going towards the tail, which means... If I raise the minimum amount, I will actually be able to afford the beter tail! In addition, I got my Ariel clamshell swim top in and a new wig, so things are looking up! Please continue to donate what you can and spread the word :) Thank you!


------------------------------------------

Hello all! Welcome to my Indiegogo to get a mermaid fin! I'm sure most of you think this is a pretty odd request, so allow me to explain the significance of getting this fin to you all and why it is so important to me!

As some of you may know, I work part time as various princesses for children's birthday parties. And I LOVE it. I love being able to interact with kids and adults alike as their favorite character, and seeing the huge smiles on their faces as their day gets a little more magical. One of my absolute favorites is Ariel, so imagine my joy the first time I got to swim at a pool party as her! Combined that with how I've always felt at home in the water ever since I was little- practicing my mermaid swim- and I knew I wanted to do that for years to come. Why don't I work at Disney World if I liked it so much? I totally would! Except I'm far out of their height limit for face characters. Meaning I can never be a princess at Disney World... So this is the closest I can get.

The fin I have to use right now is made of fabric, which means the paint comes off the bottom (where I sit on the pool steps) after only a couple swims. In addition, the end of the tail doesn't connect, meaning you can see the black monofin when I swim, which kind of ruins the illusion! I tried to velcro it together, but that looks awful too. Therefore, I would LOVE to get a silicone tail. This is where the price comes in. Silicone tails are MUCH more durable and realistic looking, but they also take a TON of time and effort and are customized, hence, the high prices. My dream fin would be one from Merbella Studios, which is one of the top fin makers but comes with a lofty price tag. If I can't raise that amount, I'm shooting for a fin made by Purple Rainbow Tails, which is less fancy but has a more modest price tag. 

 I know it seems silly or trivial to some people, and that's okay- many young women "grow out of" the dream of being a princess or a mermaid. But I have a passion for making fantasy come to life and making people's days a little more magical, and I think the fact that I haven't "outgrown" that shows my devotion to the career. If I can get this tail, I would expand my reach to also doing events for charities and environmental events. Professional mermaids often tour around talking to kids about ocean conservation and teach about aquatic life and what they can do to help the environment, and if I can give a child who wouldn't be able to afford to go to Disney world the chance to meet their favorite character, that would be amazing.


Thank you SO much for checking my page out!! I will update you with the important milestones! Have a magical day :)

story:
Save a deserted traditional Cavehouse in Santorini, transform it into a modern bioclimatic residence, and enjoy an unforgettable stay!

In Santorini, in the Southeastern Mediterranean Sea, houses are not built with traditional bricks and walls. Instead, locals have been building their unique homes for centuries by drilling deep into the volcanic rock to create  Cavehouses.

These Cavehouses were easier and cheaper to build, while also providing protection from the harsh winter winds and extreme rays of the sun in the summer heat. The natural insulation of the earthen walls regulated the interior temperature year-round, keeping inhabitants warm in the winters and cool in the summers. Built on the high volcanic cliff of Santorini’s caldera, Cavehouses also provided an ideal lookout position, as they helped inhabitants spot unwanted ship invasions by Mediterranean pirates. These Cavehouses are a fascinating glimpse into the history of the island, and also happen to provide some of the greatest views in the Mediterranean.

A local from Santorini building his Cavehouse by using a pickaxe

The interior of a typical traditional Cavehouse in Santorini

One of these Cavehouses was passed down to me by my great grandfather, a local fisherman who needed a low-budget house close to the spot of his profession – fishing. Located at the very edge of the volcanic cliff of Akrotiri village in Santorini, Greece, the Cavehouse is now more than 100 years old and has remained uninhabited and deserted for decades. Knowing what beauty and potential this Cavehouse holds, I’ve decided to share with the world my passion for restoring this Cavehouse and this part of Santorini’s history.

View of the Cavehouse captured with a Drone camera

Panoramic view of the Cavehouses’s interior, before restoration!

The purpose of this fundraising project is to save the Cavehouse from falling into ruin. My goal is to renovate this rare and spectacular structure with strict respect for local architecture, character, and style, transforming it into a modern bioclimatic rental residence. However, this project can’t be realized without your valuable and much needed support!

The Cavehouse’s location is truly one of a kind. It is literally hanging on the cliff of the caldera, offering a breathtaking view of the active volcano, the villages of Oia and Fira, the radiant blue of the Aegean Sea, and the world’s most famous sunset. The white walls of Santorini are the stuff of legend, and looking down from this Cavehouse on the edge of the caldera is awe inspiring.

View from the Cavehouse’s front door!

The Cavehouse’s location is truly one of a kind! View captured from a drone

The property consists of the existing ~50 sq m (540 sq ft) Cavehouse, which is currently an open space room carved entirely out of the hard volcanic rock, as well as a small piece of land of 70 sq m (753 sq ft).

The renovation plan has already been proposed to an architectural firm and a preliminary study has been conducted. The preliminary study includes a 3D architectural rendering and a study for the Cavehouse expansion plan.

A preliminary architectural study has already been conducted for the Cavehouse’s renovation

Once the renovation is complete, the existing Cavehouse will be expanded by drilling even further into the volcanic rock. The house’s total surface will increase to 80 sq m (860 sq ft), which will be enough for a spacious living room, a bedroom, an interior swimming pool, a kitchen and a WC. The current rooftop will be transformed into an entertainment area that will include a comfortable living room, a BBQ area, a swimming pool, a home cinema corner, and a spacious veranda for relaxing and enjoying the breathtaking view. These features bring the Cavehouse into the 21st century and make it an ideal destination for visitors to Santorini’s shores.

The new indoor swimming pool will make the Cavehouse one of a kind, offering to its residents unique moments of relaxation!

The WC will be entirely drilled into the volcanic rock

View of the Cavehouse after the completion of restoration

Part of our renovation goal is to create a Cavehouse that will be made with local materials and techniques, in addition to being energy efficient. The renovation and redesign effort will be done with strict respect for the local bioclimatic architecture to accomplish a nearly CO2 neutral residence.

This will be accomplished by:

  • The use of a drainage system that will collect rainwater during the winter to supply the pool with water during the summer.
  • The use of environmentally friendly and local construction materials.
  • Avoiding traditional air conditioning systems. The use of black volcanic rock as the main building material will store heat in the winter and lock in coolness during the summer, making traditional air conditioning systems unnecessary.
  • The use of solar panels for heating water.

 




Your support to save the Cavehouse will have the following impacts:

  • Save a traditional Cavehouse in Santorini from falling into ruin.
  • Create local jobs for more than 15 people during the 4-month restoration period and another 2 permanent part-time jobs (housekeeper and maintenance tradesman) during the operation of the Cavehouse as a rental residence. These jobs are highly desired by the local community, especially due to the current harsh economic situation in Greece.
  • Contribute to the preservation of Santorini's unique local architecture and long tradition of unique world-class masonry.
  • Establish an almost zero CO2 emission residence.

$5 - The Decorator

Participate in a Facebook game and be part of the restoration process. Vote for the Cavehouse’s wall colors, choose among different furniture options, select the type of electrical appliances, and more. The most-voted-for options listed on this Facebook app will be selected, giving you the chance to put your personal touch on the Cavehouse’s final restoration effort! You will also receive our newsletter with updates throughout our journey of renovating the Cavehouse.

$7 – Fridge Magnet

Get a beautiful Santorini fridge magnet to remind you of your valuable contribution and that Santorini should be at the top of your future travel destinations!


$12 - Korres Santorini Vine Shower Gel (200ml)

Let Santorini’s breeze flood your shower with this unique soft moisturizing shower gel made from local wine essences and natural ingredients. The dark, mineral-rich local volcanic soil adds to the grapes’ powerful properties. This shower gel features a distinct, naturally sweet aroma, inspired by the volcanic soil and the fresh sea air of Santorini.


$20 - Your name will live forever in Santorini!

Your name, your company’s name, your girlfriend’s name, or even your email or domain name will live forever on the house’s front external wall. Your name will first be carved on the Cavehouse’s outside wall and then each letter will be painted with the traditional light blue color that can only be found on Santorini.

+ After the completion of the restoration, we will email you 2 photos. One will show the house’s wall covered with all the funders’ names and a second detailed photo will show your name.

+ 15% lifetime discount on any future stay at the Cavehouse


$23 - Santorini on your smartphone case

Keep Santorini in your hand and on your mind! Select any of the 6 available case designs for your smartphone. These cases combine a shatter-proof, scratch-resistant hard shell with a cushioned rubber insert to provide superior protection for your phone. Cases are available for ALL Apple and Samsung phones. Don't forget to select your style and specify your exact phone model when you choose this perk.

+ 15% lifetime discount on any future stay at the Cavehouse


$25 - Bottle of Santorini wine

Earn a voucher for a bottle of local Santorini wine known as Assyrtiko. Assyrtiko is a dry, full-bodied white wine with citrus aromas combined with a pleasing mineral character derived from the volcanic soil in which this variety is grown.

+ 15% lifetime discount on any future stay at the renovated Cavehouse
+ Tickets for 2 for wine tastings at a local winery in Santorini


$39 – The Renovator

Roll your sleeves up and physically help us with the house’s actual renovation. This level of support grants you a 3-night stay at the Cavehouse during the restoration process. You'll sleep in your sleeping bag or in one of the available beds and you will help us as much as you want with the ongoing restoration activities, including painting, plumbing, decorating, and drilling into the volcanic rock. Choose this perk and join our effort to save a beautiful living example of Santorini’s traditional architecture, while having the chance to meet us, discover the beauty of the island, and have plenty of fun!

+ includes free continental breakfast and free pickup from Santorini’s seaport or airport.
+ 30% lifetime discount on any future stay at the Cavehouse

$59 – The Cavehouse Visitor

Choose this level of support and earn a two-day stay at the renovated Cavehouse to enjoy the breathtaking view of the volcano and the stunning blue sea from the verge of the cliff, all while swimming in the pool! This perk is our way to thank you for your valuable help to back the Cavehouse’s renovation.

+ includes free pickup from Santorini’s seaport or airport

This perk is valid for 2 people or small family and can be redeemed any time within the next 5 years.

$89 – Santorini real volcano stone set on sterling silver ring

Get this unique ring made of 925 solid silver and real lava stone produced from volcanic eruptions in Santorini and handcrafted by local jewelers. This ring can become the perfect gift for someone really special!


$149 – The Cavevouse Bon Vivant

Enjoy a five-day stay at the renovated Santorini Cavehouse. You can enjoy the breathtaking view of the volcano and the stunning blue sea from the verge of the cliff, all while swimming in the pool, or simply enjoy your cocktail while you gaze at the world’s most breathtaking sunset.

+ Complimentary welcome gift of a chilled bottle of local Santorini wine       upon arrival
+ Your name carved and painted onto the house’s external wall
+ 2 tickets for Santorini’s Archaeological Museum

This perk is valid for 2 people or small family and can be redeemed any time within the next 10 years.


$349 - Santorini Honeymooners Party

Spend a full week of your honeymoon trip at the renovated Cavehouse on the world's most romantic island!
Upon your arrival, you will find the Cavehouse decorated in a honeymoon style just for you.

This perk also includes:

+ Complimentary welcome gift of a chilled bottle of Champagne upon    arrival
+ Your name carved and colored on the house’s external wall and circled    in a carved heart
+ Scuba diving lesson for 2 at Santorini’s volcano reef. Enjoy this unique  experience guided by a certified, professional diver.
+ 2 tickets for Santorini’s Archaeological Museum
+ 2 tickets for a wine tasting at a local winery
+ Romantic dinner for 2 at a local restaurant. Enjoy your Greek dinner on    a scenic balcony that will offer you a magnificent panoramic view of the  caldera and Santorini’s legendary sunset

This perk is valid for 2 people and can be redeemed any time within the next 10 years.


$4,000 - Cavehouse Resident

At this level of support, you earn the right to stay at the Cavehouse for 2 weeks, every year, for the next 10 years!

+ Your name will be carved and painted onto the house’s external wall

$7,000 - Cavehouse Godfather & Resident

This top level of support will make you the grand supporter of our renovation effort of Santorini Cavehouse. If you choose this reward level, you secure the right to become the Cavehouse’s Godfather. You can select any name and we will have it carved above the entrance to the main house. The name that you select will also appear on the house’s website. You will also earn the right to stay at the Cavehouse for one month, every year, for the next 15 years, on the days of your preference.

Other Ways You Can Help - Spread the word

We know that not all of you have the ability to help monetarily – and that's okay! There are other ways that you can contribute to the Santorini Cavehouse Project.

Please help us by spreading the word!

Tweet your support and share our FB page


Q: When will I receive my perk?

A: All perks will be dispatched immediately after the end of the fundraising. All perks related to the stay at the Cavehouse will be delivered after the completion of the renovation. It's estimated that the Cavehouse will be ready to welcome its first supporters approximately 4 months after the end of the fundraising period. All supporters will be notified and updated throughout the process.

Q: I decided to support you by staying at the Cavehouse. What’s next?

A: First, we'll ask you which dates you want to spend at the Cavehouse. Then, we’ll send you a voucher for your stay and clear instructions on how to get to the Cavehouse, as well as other useful information.

Q: What if the targeted budget goal is not reached?

A: In the unlikely event that we don’t manage to raise the money we need, we’ll do everything necessary to find an alternative method of financing our vision and have the Cavehouse saved and renovated. We will most likely proceed by securing a small bank loan. We refuse to give up on this dream. All perks are 100% secured and will be granted to our generous funders. For those funders who select the option to stay at the Cavehouse after the renovation is complete, we‘ll do our best to find them alternative residences in Santorini in the unlikely event that the project’s targeted budget is not reached or a bank loan is not secured.

Q: Is shipping included for my perk?

A: Shipping cost is not included and depends on your shipping address. Please contact us for detailed shipping rates. We ship using Greek National Postal Services, so you can expect the shipping cost to be relatively low.

 

He believes that the revival of the Greek economy can only be accomplished through the passion, the new ideas and the hard work of young Greek entrepreneurs. He has a hard time saying no in doing things that are fun and trigger his creativity.

When Antonis doesn’t sail the Mediterranean, he uses his passion and enthuasiam in start-up companies and new ideas. He spends most of his free time with his beloved golden retriever and riding his bicycle.

Although she is a graduate hygienist, you will be surprised by her unique skills in interior decoration and design. She loves to spend time with her adorable 2-year old daughter.

Santorini – The Cavehouse Project

Be part of our effort to save a traditional Cavehouse in Santorini!
