These Cavehouses are a fascinating glimpse into the history of the island, and also happen to provide some of the greatest views in the Mediterranean.

A local from Santorini building his Cavehouse by using a pickaxe


The interior of a typical traditional Cavehouse in Santorini

One of these Cavehouses was passed down to me by my great grandfather, a local fisherman who needed a low-budget house close to the spot of his profession – fishing. 
Located at the very edge of the volcanic cliff of Akrotiri village in Santorini, Greece, the Cavehouse is now more than 100 years old and has remained uninhabited and deserted for decades. Knowing what beauty and potential this Cavehouse holds, I’ve decided to share with the world my passion for restoring this Cavehouse and this part of Santorini’s history.


View of the Cavehouse captured with a Drone camera

Panoramic view of the Cavehouses’s interior, before restoration!
The purpose of this fundraising project is to save the Cavehouse from falling into ruin. My goal is to renovate this rare and spectacular structure with strict respect for local architecture, character, and style, transforming it into a modern bioclimatic rental residence. However, this project can’t be realized without your valuable and much needed support!


The Cavehouse’s location is truly one of a kind. It is literally hanging on the cliff of the caldera, offering a breathtaking view of the active volcano, the villages of Oia and Fira, the radiant blue of the Aegean Sea, and the world’s most famous sunset. The white walls of Santorini are the stuff of legend, and looking down from this Cavehouse on the edge of the caldera is awe inspiring. 

View from the Cavehouse’s front door!

The Cavehouse’s location is truly one of a kind! View captured from a drone 
The property consists of the existing ~50 sq m (540 sq ft) Cavehouse, which is currently an open space room carved entirely out of the hard volcanic rock, as well as a small piece of land of 70 sq m (753 sq ft).
The renovation plan has already been proposed to an architectural firm and a preliminary study has been conducted. The preliminary study includes a 3D architectural rendering and a study for the Cavehouse expansion plan.

A preliminary architectural study has already been conducted for the Cavehouse’s renovation
Once the renovation is complete, the existing Cavehouse will be expanded by drilling even further into the volcanic rock. The house’s total surface will increase to 80 sq m (860 sq ft), which will be enough for a spacious living room, a bedroom, an interior swimming pool, a kitchen and a WC. The current rooftop will be transformed into an entertainment area that will include a comfortable living room, a BBQ area, a swimming pool, a home cinema corner, and a spacious veranda for relaxing and enjoying the breathtaking view. These features bring the Cavehouse into the 21st century and make it an ideal destination for visitors to Santorini’s shores.








The new indoor swimming pool will make the Cavehouse one of a kind, offering to its residents unique moments of relaxation!

The WC will be entirely drilled into the volcanic rock

View of the Cavehouse after the completion of restoration

Part of our renovation goal is to create a Cavehouse that will be made with local materials and techniques, in addition to being energy efficient.
The renovation and redesign effort will be done with strict respect for the local bioclimatic architecture to accomplish a nearly CO2 neutral residence.

This will be accomplished by:

The use of a drainage system that will collect rainwater during the winter to supply the pool with water during the summer.

The use of environmentally friendly and local construction materials.

Avoiding traditional air conditioning systems. The use of black volcanic rock as the main building material will store heat in the winter and lock in coolness during the summer, making traditional air conditioning systems unnecessary.

The use of solar panels for heating water.


 







Your support to save the Cavehouse will have the following impacts:



Save a traditional Cavehouse in Santorini from falling into ruin. 

Create local jobs for more than 15 people during the 4-month restoration period and another 2 permanent part-time jobs (housekeeper and maintenance tradesman) during the operation of the Cavehouse as a rental residence. These jobs are highly desired by the local community, especially due to the current harsh economic situation in Greece.

Contribute to the preservation of Santorini's unique local architecture and long tradition of unique world-class masonry.

Establish an almost zero CO2 emission residence.


$5 - The Decorator 
Participate in a Facebook game and be part of the restoration process. Vote for the Cavehouse’s wall colors, choose among different furniture options, select the type of electrical appliances, and more. The most-voted-for options listed on this Facebook app will be selected, giving you the chance to put your personal touch on the Cavehouse’s final restoration effort! You will also receive our newsletter with updates throughout our journey of renovating the Cavehouse.
$7 – Fridge Magnet 
Get a beautiful Santorini fridge magnet to remind you of your valuable contribution and that Santorini should be at the top of your future travel destinations! 

$12 - Korres Santorini Vine Shower Gel (200ml) 
Let Santorini’s breeze flood your shower with this unique soft moisturizing shower gel made from local wine essences and natural ingredients. The dark, mineral-rich local volcanic soil adds to the grapes’ powerful properties. This shower gel features a distinct, naturally sweet aroma, inspired by the volcanic soil and the fresh sea air of Santorini.

$20 - Your name will live forever in Santorini!
Your name, your company’s name, your girlfriend’s name, or even your email or domain name will live forever on the house’s front external wall. Your name will first be carved on the Cavehouse’s outside wall and then each letter will be painted with the traditional light blue color that can only be found on Santorini.  
+ After the completion of the restoration, we will email you 2 photos. One will show the house’s wall covered with all the funders’ names and a second detailed photo will show your name.
+ 15% lifetime discount on any future stay at the Cavehouse


$23 - Santorini on your smartphone case 

Keep Santorini in your hand and on your mind! Select any of the 6 available case designs for your smartphone. These cases combine a shatter-proof, scratch-resistant hard shell with a cushioned rubber insert to provide superior protection for your phone. Cases are available for ALL Apple and Samsung phones. Don't forget to select your style and specify your exact phone model when you choose this perk.
+ 15% lifetime discount on any future stay at the Cavehouse

$25 - Bottle of Santorini wine
Earn a voucher for a bottle of local Santorini wine known as Assyrtiko. Assyrtiko is a dry, full-bodied white wine with citrus aromas combined with a pleasing mineral character derived from the volcanic soil in which this variety is grown. 
+ 15% lifetime discount on any future stay at the renovated Cavehouse

+ Tickets for 2 for wine tastings at a local winery in Santorini


$39 – The Renovator 
Roll your sleeves up and physically help us with the house’s actual renovation. 
This level of support grants you a 3-night stay at the Cavehouse during the restoration process. You'll sleep in your sleeping bag or in one of the available beds and you will help us as much as you want with the ongoing restoration activities, including painting, plumbing, decorating, and drilling into the volcanic rock. Choose this perk and join our effort to save a beautiful living example of Santorini’s traditional architecture, while having the chance to meet us, discover the beauty of the island, and have plenty of fun! 

+ includes free continental breakfast and free pickup from Santorini’s seaport or airport.

+ 30% lifetime discount on any future stay at the Cavehouse

$59 – The Cavehouse Visitor 
Choose this level of support and earn a two-day stay at the renovated Cavehouse to enjoy the breathtaking view of the volcano and the stunning blue sea from the verge of the cliff, all while swimming in the pool! This perk is our way to thank you for your valuable help to back the Cavehouse’s renovation.
+ includes free pickup from Santorini’s seaport or airport

This perk is valid for 2 people or small family and can be redeemed any time within the next 5 years.
$89 – Santorini real volcano stone set on sterling silver ring
Get this unique ring made of 925 solid silver and real lava stone produced from volcanic eruptions in Santorini and handcrafted by local jewelers. This ring can become the perfect gift for someone really special!

$149 – The Cavevouse Bon Vivant
Enjoy a five-day stay at the renovated Santorini Cavehouse. You can enjoy the breathtaking view of the volcano and the stunning blue sea from the verge of the cliff, all while swimming in the pool, or simply enjoy your cocktail while you gaze at the world’s most breathtaking sunset.
+ Complimentary welcome gift of a chilled bottle of local Santorini wine       upon arrival

+ Your name carved and painted onto the house’s external wall

+ 2 tickets for Santorini’s Archaeological Museum

This perk is valid for 2 people or small family and can be redeemed any time within the next 10 years.

$349 - Santorini Honeymooners Party 

Spend a full week of your honeymoon trip at the renovated Cavehouse on the world's most romantic island! 
Upon your arrival, you will find the Cavehouse decorated in a honeymoon style just for you.
This perk also includes:
+ Complimentary welcome gift of a chilled bottle of Champagne upon    arrival

+ Your name carved and colored on the house’s external wall and circled    in a carved heart
+ Scuba diving lesson for 2 at Santorini’s volcano reef. Enjoy this unique  experience guided by a certified, professional diver.
+ 2 tickets for Santorini’s Archaeological Museum
+ 2 tickets for a wine tasting at a local winery
+ Romantic dinner for 2 at a local restaurant. Enjoy your Greek dinner on    a scenic balcony that will offer you a magnificent panoramic view of the  caldera and Santorini’s legendary sunset

This perk is valid for 2 people and can be redeemed any time within the next 10 years. 

$4,000 - Cavehouse Resident 
At this level of support, you earn the right to stay at the Cavehouse for 2 weeks, every year, for the next 10 years!
+ Your name will be carved and painted onto the house’s external wall
$7,000 - Cavehouse Godfather & Resident 
This top level of support will make you the grand supporter of our renovation effort of Santorini Cavehouse. If you choose this reward level, you secure the right to become the Cavehouse’s Godfather. You can select any name and we will have it carved above the entrance to the main house. The name that you select will also appear on the house’s website. You will also earn the right to stay at the Cavehouse for one month, every year, for the next 15 years, on the days of your preference.
Other Ways You Can Help - Spread the word
We know that not all of you have the ability to help monetarily – and that's okay!
There are other ways that you can contribute to the Santorini Cavehouse Project. 

Please help us by spreading the word! 
Tweet your support and share our FB page 
 

Q: When will I receive my perk?
A:  All perks will be dispatched immediately after the end of the fundraising. All perks related to the stay at the Cavehouse will be delivered after the completion of the renovation. It's estimated that the Cavehouse will be ready to welcome its first supporters approximately 4 months after the end of the fundraising period. All supporters will be notified and updated throughout the process.
Q: I decided to support you by staying at the Cavehouse. What’s next?
A: First, we'll ask you which dates you want to spend at the Cavehouse. Then, we’ll send you a voucher for your stay and clear instructions on how to get to the Cavehouse, as well as other useful information. 
Q: What if the targeted budget goal is not reached?
A:  In the unlikely event that we don’t manage to raise the money we need, we’ll do everything necessary to find an alternative method of financing our vision and have the Cavehouse saved and renovated. We will most likely proceed by securing a small bank loan. We refuse to give up on this dream. All perks are 100% secured and will be granted to our generous funders. For those funders who select the option to stay at the Cavehouse after the renovation is complete, we‘ll do our best to find them alternative residences in Santorini in the unlikely event that the project’s targeted budget is not reached or a bank loan is not secured.
Q: Is shipping included for my perk?
A:  Shipping cost is not included and depends on your shipping address. Please contact us for detailed shipping rates. We ship using Greek National Postal Services, so you can expect the shipping cost to be relatively low.
 
He believes that the revival of the Greek economy can only be accomplished through the passion, the new ideas and the hard work of young Greek entrepreneurs. He has a hard time saying no in doing things that are fun and trigger his creativity.

When Antonis doesn’t sail the Mediterranean, he uses his passion and enthuasiam in start-up companies and new ideas. He spends most of his free time with his beloved golden retriever and riding his bicycle.

Although she is a graduate hygienist, you will be surprised by her unique skills in interior decoration and design. She loves to spend time with her adorable 2-year old daughter.
Santorini – The Cavehouse Project
Be part of our effort to save a traditional Cavehouse in Santorini!

story:
Overview

A while back, a computer system did something that it had not been programmed to do. It started using a pair of webcams under its control to track the movement of objects that were in its visual field. There was no software in the system written to track objects.

SURPRISE!!!

Next, quite a bit of research went into figuring out why that happened. When an answer was found for why, there was a natural progression to the next question: How can we do that deliberately whenever we want? FnnTEK was formed to find that answer and put it into practice.

My name is William Sadler, I am the inventor of the technology and founder of FnnTEK. The basic technology is called a Fractal Neural Network and is the source of our name. The technology is an entirely new approach for a truly intelligent system; an emergent computational architecture, not a deterministic one.

The theory is based on a principle called 'Strong Emergence'. Additional information can be found on the TEKnology page of our website. For now, suffice it to say that we have a theoretical foundation for creating cognition using current digital computer hardware.

This project is the culmination of many years of research, experimentation, and many false starts. We have now moved from a single proof of concept to a product that is involved in US Government testing for use as a front line cyber security appliance.

What we are looking to achieve

There are two reasons why FnnTEK is pursuing a crowdfunding campaign at this time:

The first reason is simple - we need additional R&D funding and our technology is now at the point where we are comfortable offering the services of cognitive AI as perks for the campaign. Opening the door to early adopters will get our TEK to the public more quickly and greatly enhance the capabilities of the AI.

Second, we do not want the Government to be the only beneficiary of our cognitive AI. Certainly they are a viable market - but the ability to create cognitive devices as ubiquitous as smart phone technology requires non-governmental customers. Also, frankly - extreme claims require extreme proof. While we are sure we can construct commercial systems, we do not currently have the wherewithal to do so.

Short Term

We are seeking to construct a civilian developmental and production FrANN™ facility to exceed the capability of the one we have built for DHS. Not an extensive facility, we are looking to provision 4 production quality servers, two as developmental systems and two as operational systems for commercial AI applications.

Long Term

If FnnTEK is correct on our theories - then almost all (I'm tempted to say all, but I'm not familiar with all other research) other AI efforts will fail to produce true cognition. Every effort that we have found in the literature requires the researcher to understand some cognitive function to reproduce it in a closed form algorithm. Don't know about you, but I don't solve a system of differential equations when I catch a baseball. I don't have to invoke algorithms to understand - understanding is not algorithmic, it is emergent.

So - we are demonstrating emergent cognition. Our expectation is that we will be able to achieve near primate intelligence with the next iteration of our system. Our current system uses an animal (small mammal, mouse level) nervous system complexity and feedback model. The system we are looking to fund will have the complexity of a large mammal (dog, cat) or possibly a small primate by some measurements of cognitive capability.

Our original neural model that controlled the cameras had the complexity of a small insect - and it was able to make a computer perform a simple  task with no programming. The ability to track objects in three-space was an emergent property of that little network, not an algorithmic one. We spent a long time figuring out how that happened. Our current small mammal AI can detect network anomalies and make a determination if they are malicious or benign. We're ready to take it to the next level.

Specific Needs

Capital

Our funding target is: $750k

Equipmennt

4 Production FrANN Hardware Platforms $95k each (described HERE), $380k total

Facilities

2 geographically diverse server facilities to host the production servers for one year. $35k each  location, $70k total

Staff

3 senior developers for one year, $100k / each, $300k total

Should we exceed our goal, funds will directly go into one of our 'proposed TEK' projects on our website. Specifically, the creation of a driver to convert any stock vehicle into autonomous operation, and the development of cognitive assistive technology.

Should we not reach our goal, any funds collected will go for the hardware resources needed to stand up a single production server.

Our Perks

Our perks have never been available before, because the technology didn't exist. They are based upon the product that the NSA was originally interested in that we have re-purposed for mining of financial data.

The NSA wanted the ability to mine structured and unstructured data (think XML for structured and handwritten / audio / video for unstructured) for obvious and un-obvious relationships. DifMAN takes that capability into open source financial data. By looking at the Internet as a whole, news feeds, audio video and financial data sources, DifMAN finds relationships in the data and makes a determination where the arbitrage opportunities will be for upcoming period under consideration.

The trading model that the system uses is fairly simple buy, sell, hold equities - the system examines all publicly traded stocks that can be bought in the US and are listed on Yahoo financial. The system's recommendations go into a simulated portfolio and performance is tracked against human fund managers. They are re-balanced based upon the period under observation. The system can issue a 'buy', 'sell', or 'hold' recommendation for each equity in each of its simulated portfolios once per time period. It takes into account the trading fees involved (including the subscription fees for its own newsletter) as if it were a human stock trader using a typical online brokerage service.

Over time we will add various other capabilities (covered calls comes to mind) to the trading model and the system will begin using these tools.

The perks themselves are an electronic newsletter that is written by the AI (except one column by me that speaks to the status of the technology, not any financial information) - the price of the newsletter is based upon how often the information is published - six different periods that range from a year down to a daily review. Each shorter period gets all the longer periods as well. The periods are Annual, Bi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly, Weekly, and Daily.

Each newsletter is sent out after US market close on the last trading day of the trading period for that newsletter. We do cap the number of subscriptions to avoid the possibility of moving the market with our recommendations.

Your Impact

There has been quite a bit of discussion about the 'dangers of AI' in the news lately. Most of the stories have to do with an 'intelligent' machine that oversteps its small optimization environment in an unexpected way. Something along the lines of throwing a cat into a furnace to eliminate fleas. AI says, "Fleas Gone" - a perfect solution but with no cognitive restraint. The genesis of this problem is the kind of AI being built - they are ever increasingly efficient optimization machines. But they are NOT cognitive. An AI that is truly cognitive recognizes the constraints of the problem without them having to be stated explicitly. The solution is not to stuff the genie back into the bottle - the solution is to get the genie on your side.

The development of cognitive AI vs optimizing AI is the method by which the genie can be tamed. Your contributions to this effort will make it happen.

We are on the way! The first two tests of our systems have revealed that our network appliance can detect network anomalies faster than human operators, and can react to incidents where it was trained faster than the human operator. Our next series of tests will put our system in control of the security of a test network first, then a live operational environment. We are looking forward to taking those techniques into the public arena with your assistance.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute that's ok, but it doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about us!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, tell your friends, light up your contact lists!

story:
In the modern world every ninth person has diabetes, every eighth suffers from obesity, and every fourth has hypertension. We think that we have found a great way to help them. Really. 

While people try to manage their lives, their time, their health, their money, their diet, they use a huge number of different tools for that. The problem is, these tools often need even more time, more money, and they cause even more troubles. Some of them are just inconvenient, and almost every single tool you can find is incompatible with everything that you already have. They simply were not designed to work together! So we have a very ambitious goal. We are building an ecosystem of devices and programs to create one solid environment which is going to help you to manage every aspect of your life. It's going to be simple, useful and affordable. 

We begin with the most important part. The cooking process.

For many people kitchen is a small center of the universe. And we want to make it as convenient as possible.So we have started with the design and came up with this square shape. It allows you to save your precious storage space and makes your kitchen look cleaner.


Next, we wanted to make our dishes smarter. The new materials allow us to install the entire smart system inside of the pan, including temperature and humidity sensors. It made it possible to manage the cooking process very carefully, so we needed an automatic system to control it.


All you have to do is to put your kettle on the stove. It will recognize the object andlaunch its own unique program: heat to a boil and turn off. No buttons, no whistles. And yes, when your water is hot enough, you get a notification to your smartphone. Nothing can be easier!



For the proper control of finance, needs thought out purchases plan, as well as we now know how to cook, then why not combine these systems? And on the basis of the food you purchased, your system will offer you recipes that loaded in your kitchen system. And the perfect lunch or dinner will be ready without hassle.

By the way, it does not matter, how exactly you put a pot, a pan or a kettle on the surface of the stove. Our system detects the object by itself. 

You can do it this way: 

Or this way: 

It makes no difference. Your dinner is going to be excellent in any way.

Now, when our system knows what you eat, it can take care of your health.

Weight control system:


Our scales are connected to the system, so you can get all the data to your smartphoneor computer. You can use this information to keep a diary and control your weight. You may add up to nine users, so you can receive the information about all of your family members. As the system knows your weight and your ration, it can propose you an optimal diet according to your weight and age.



Temperature control:

There's nothing more common than a thermometer, right? But we made it smart, too. It does not only measures your body temperature, it generates a graph which might be sent to your doctor.


If you (or your child) have fever, your doctor gets notified immediately.

Blood sugar control:

Our blood sugar tester is unique. It uses a non-invasive method of measuring, so there will be no more needles and no more pain. 

All you need to do is to touch it, and you'll get a detailed graph which allows you to track your blood sugar level in dynamics or provide your doctor with the most precise data. 

The device can remind you about the time of measurements. When the system knows your blood sugar level, the food you like and your daily activities, it can help you to chose the best diet according to your condition.


Blood pressure control:

This system is very easy to use, too. Just put your finger inside the sensor and press the button to get the information about your blood pressure and heart rate. You may send it to your doctor or use it to create the most efficient training schedule. The sensor is tiny, so you can use it everywhere, right on the go. 

You can access the information provided by the sensor from your smartphone or tablet whenever you want.

 When we design each element of our system, we think of people who will use it, of how they are going to use it, of how to make it simple and convenient. We came up with the idea called “One button design”: whatever you need is one click away.

Many elements of our system allow you to heat only the desired part of the surface which saves space and energy.



The whole system is based on the MediaTek MT7681 chip which is a compact Wi-Fi SoC.It lets us build tiny things with the widest range of functions. It is safe and reliable, so we can mount it in every element of our system.



Electronic elements in our dishes are protected by a special airgel, which doesn't let thehigh temperature affect it. The construction itself is fairly simple. It looks like this:

 

This scheme allows us to significantly reduce the cost of the product. There are no 

expensive elements or technologies in the client's equipment, all the information is being processed in the cloud. Besides, we provide our customers with a reliable cloud storage and grant them permanent access to their data. You need no special knowledge to start using our system. You don't need any wires. All you need is an Internet connection and a smartphone.


Our system is neither another home automation technology, nor just a bunch of devices tracking where you are, taking photos of your meal and posting your sports achievements to the social network. Our goal is to make your life easier, healthier and happier with the system, which comprehensively covers all aspects of your life. We are talking about the new life experience. No more painful blood tests or uncomfortable blood pressure monitors. No more long conversations with you doctor, while trying to explain your symptoms. No more stickers around the house where you were trying to keep track of so many things simultaneously. No more meal burnt down to embers. Our system is going to take care of it. It will help you with your daily routines, it will let you chose your diet more accurate, it will let you plan your activities more efficiently. Knowing your eating habits, it will even help you to put up your grocery list if you provide your favorite recipes to the system. 



It is a new lifestyle. A smart lifestyle for you and your family.


We have completed all stages of the design, and now we are ready to start building prototypes. We have two teams of developers who are ready to start implementing the software. So yes, we are ready to bring our system to the physical world!



Because no one has ever done anything like this.

Because there are no systems of this kind in the world yet. 

Because people will always be concerned about their helth. And they will always cook their meal. 

Because we offer an absolutely new system which can significantly improve the quality of your life.

Because we change the most important things for the better.

In the modern world every ninth person has diabetes, every eighth suffers from obesity, and every fourth has hypertension. We think that we have found a great way to help them. Really. 
While people try to manage their lives, their time, their health, their money, their diet, they use a huge number of different tools for that. The problem is, these tools often need even more time, more money, and they cause even more troubles. Some of them are just inconvenient, and almost every single tool you can find is incompatible with everything that you already have. They simply were not designed to work together! So we have a very ambitious goal. We are building an ecosystem of devices and programs to create one solid environment which is going to help you to manage every aspect of your life. It's going to be simple, useful and affordable. 
We begin with the most important part. The cooking process.





For many people kitchen is a small center of the universe. And we want to make it as convenient as possible.So we have started with the design and came up with this square shape. It allows you to save your precious storage space and makes your kitchen look cleaner.



Next, we wanted to make our dishes smarter. The new materials allow us to install the entire smart system inside of the pan, including temperature and humidity sensors. It made it possible to manage the cooking process very carefully, so we needed an automatic system to control it.





All you have to do is to put your kettle on the stove. It will recognize the object andlaunch its own unique program: heat to a boil and turn off. No buttons, no whistles. And yes, when your water is hot enough, you get a notification to your smartphone. Nothing can be easier!






For the proper control of finance, needs thought out purchases plan, as well as we now know how to cook, then why not combine these systems? And on the basis of the food you purchased, your system will offer you recipes that loaded in your kitchen system. And the perfect lunch or dinner will be ready without hassle.

By the way, it does not matter, how exactly you put a pot, a pan or a kettle on the surface of the stove. Our system detects the object by itself. 
You can do it this way: 



Or this way: 


It makes no difference. Your dinner is going to be excellent in any way.







Now, when our system knows what you eat, it can take care of your health.
Weight control system:





Our scales are connected to the system, so you can get all the data to your smartphoneor computer. You can use this information to keep a diary and control your weight. You may add up to nine users, so you can receive the information about all of your family members. As the system knows your weight and your ration, it can propose you an optimal diet according to your weight and age.



Temperature control:
There's nothing more common than a thermometer, right? But we made it smart, too. It does not only measures your body temperature, it generates a graph which might be sent to your doctor.



If you (or your child) have fever, your doctor gets notified immediately.



Blood sugar control:
Our blood sugar tester is unique. It uses a non-invasive method of measuring, so there will be no more needles and no more pain. 



All you need to do is to touch it, and you'll get a detailed graph which allows you to track your blood sugar level in dynamics or provide your doctor with the most precise data. 

The device can remind you about the time of measurements. When the system knows your blood sugar level, the food you like and your daily activities, it can help you to chose the best diet according to your condition.




Blood pressure control:

This system is very easy to use, too. Just put your finger inside the sensor and press the button to get the information about your blood pressure and heart rate. You may send it to your doctor or use it to create the most efficient training schedule. The sensor is tiny, so you can use it everywhere, right on the go. 

You can access the information provided by the sensor from your smartphone or tablet whenever you want.


 When we design each element of our system, we think of people who will use it, of how they are going to use it, of how to make it simple and convenient. We came up with the idea called “One button design”: whatever you need is one click away.





Many elements of our system allow you to heat only the desired part of the surface which saves space and energy.








The whole system is based on the MediaTek MT7681 chip which is a compact Wi-Fi SoC.It lets us build tiny things with the widest range of functions. It is safe and reliable, so we can mount it in every element of our system.








Electronic elements in our dishes are protected by a special airgel, which doesn't let thehigh temperature affect it. The construction itself is fairly simple. It looks like this: 



This scheme allows us to significantly reduce the cost of the product. There are no 
expensive elements or technologies in the client's equipment, all the information is being processed in the cloud. Besides, we provide our customers with a reliable cloud storage and grant them permanent access to their data. You need no special knowledge to start using our system. You don't need any wires. All you need is an Internet connection and a smartphone.





Our system is neither another home automation technology, nor just a bunch of devices tracking where you are, taking photos of your meal and posting your sports achievements to the social network. Our goal is to make your life easier, healthier and happier with the system, which comprehensively covers all aspects of your life. We are talking about the new life experience. No more painful blood tests or uncomfortable blood pressure monitors. No more long conversations with you doctor, while trying to explain your symptoms. No more stickers around the house where you were trying to keep track of so many things simultaneously. No more meal burnt down to embers. Our system is going to take care of it. It will help you with your daily routines, it will let you chose your diet more accurate, it will let you plan your activities more efficiently. Knowing your eating habits, it will even help you to put up your grocery list if you provide your favorite recipes to the system. 







It is a new lifestyle. A smart lifestyle for you and your family.


 





We have completed all stages of the design, and now we are ready to start building prototypes. We have two teams of developers who are ready to start implementing the software. So yes, we are ready to bring our system to the physical world!










Because no one has ever done anything like this.
Because there are no systems of this kind in the world yet. 
Because people will always be concerned about their helth. And they will always cook their meal. 
Because we offer an absolutely new system which can significantly improve the quality of your life.
Because we change the most important things for the better.

story:
Seks Beer. Imagine the possibilities.... We have. 

“Everybody wants Seks!”
“Don't just drink beer, have Seks!”
“Seks Beer... coming to a mouth near you!”

The list goes on and on and on…

     Hi, my name is Greg Pappas. When my partners (Mike, Jack and Billy) and I originally thought of Seks Beer a few years ago, we all laughed aloud at the whole concept. However, as with many ideas, it faded away over time- until a chance discussion recently reignited it. Within hours, the four of us were having a lot of fun coming up with dozens of new slogans and other semi-juvenile concepts. We quickly realized that if we brewed a quality tasting beer that was marketed in the fashion we wanted, Seks could be a really big hit. After all, "Seks" sells!

     Through many hours of taste testing, uhhh "research", we determined that a blonde ale was the style of beer that fit our brand, as it is a lighter craft beer enjoyed by both men and women. We then met with a brewmaster in our home city of Baltimore and were enlightened as to the inner workings of running a brewery and budding beer business, yet just as importantly, how to craft the blonde ale we were shooting for.  While each of us have a background in business and customer service and understand how to operate and help facilitate a successful small business, we aren't looking to open our own brewery- initially. We’d rather contract with one that understands what it takes to run the business properly, from brewing our beer to our specifications, to bottling the beer and shipping it out to establishments that will provide our fine product. This would allow us to start strong right out of the gate- while affording us an easier management learning curve- as we grow. We'll begin locally in Baltimore and the Mid-Atlantic region and eventually branch out to every state, country, and planet that will have us! Now THAT is ambitious!

     The monies raised here will cover the initial cost of the bottles, packaging, ingredients, brewer fees, consulting fees, advertising costs and other expenses for our launch. 

      Finding investors is a daunting task, and since we’re not close to being in a position of funding it ourselves, friends convinced us that the best way to approach raising capital is to go the IndieGoGo route. This is, essentially, a great investment, as we believe that it's vital to forge a community of folks invested in our present and future, building both loyalty and long-lasting relationships. We're genuinely excited by this and we need your help. We can't get this done without you.
           So, after a great deal of time, effort and preparation, we're ready to start having Seks with you!  ;)


P.S. Please feel free to ask a question or leave a comment within the comments section near the top of the page. Thank you. :)

story:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT

A strong, independent and objective news voice is critical for Compton, Calif., as the City strives to redefine its image while closely monitoring the workings of city government and business. Compton is a municipality south of downtown Los Angeles of slightly more than 100,000 residents; a city that had been void of a newspaper before the emergence of the Compton Herald in 2013. The Herald serves as an important objective voice providing general coverage of important issues that impact the public to up-close-and personal investigative stories of public officials. The Herald also strives to publish the profiles and features of local interest that serve to re-define a city beset by previous images that have characterized Compton as a haven of crime and violence. But Compton in 2015 is a city on the move and the Herald reflects this, balancing the city's narrative, shaping and augmenting its brand.

The Herald also endeavors to bridge a cultural challenge in the community. The city is comprised largely of two ethnic groups --- African Americans and Latino Americans. The latter can be sub-divided into English-speaking and Spanish-only residents. The Herald plans to launch a Spanish tabloid insert titled the Compton Heraldo, which will carry the same editorial content to serve the information needs of the non-English speaking community staffed with a Spanish-speaking editor for translation. The larger staff of the Herald will produce editorial copy for the Heraldo.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

The Herald began without the benefit of a large cash outlay but managed to publish 5,000 copies of a 16-page broadsheet newspaper on a weekly basis on faith, work ethic, and enduring energy. The newspaper, however, has published inconsistently due to a lack of consistent working capital. Our goal is to raise $160,000 to pay weekly publishing expenses: $1,700 for reporting/writing, and photojournalism; editing and pagination; printing and distributing 5,000 copies. The capital will also pay for an office, paid office secretary, and utility expenses to publish consistently every week for one year independent of city government. Following one year (52 straight weeks) of publishing the Herald will qualify under California state law for adjudication by the Los Angeles County Superior Court, which will enable the Herald to legally bid for lucrative legal advertising from the City Attorney. Revenue from legal advertising will effectively create a strong fiscal foundation for expansion and growth as the Herald strives to further strengthen its finances through retail and corporate advertising revenue.

A BENEFIT FOR THE COMMUNITY

Every city and town in America deserves the benefit of a solid objective newspaper. Freedom of the press is the cornerstone of a free democracy as established by the First Amendment to the U.S. Constitution. Compton will better serve its citizenry with a strong Compton Herald serving to scrutinize city government, assuring transparency, holding city officials accountable, encouraging citizen participation in the governing process at city council meetings, as well as in the voting booth. Additionally, as an active member of the city’s chamber of commerce, the Herald will serve to foment a healthy and prosperous business environment serving as a partner to enhance marketability and promotion. In the area of education, the Compton Herald will also keep families abreast of the educational policies of the local K-12 school district, and the opportunities for higher learning at the local community college.

WHERE YOUR MONEY WILL GO

The production of a weekly newspaper requires a full time commitment. Aside from the expensive cost of printing, the production of a first-rate newspaper requires an office bearing utility expenses, delivery costs requiring a vehicle w/ gas/oil expenses; and unanticipated ancillary expenses.

The $160,000 will be specifically earmarked for:

Printing monthly:   $6,800.00   ($1,700.00 per week)

Delivery monthly:   $1,600.00   ($400.00 per week)

Delivery van/gas:  $1,200.00  ($300.00 per week)

Office monthly:  $1,300.00

Ancillary costs:  $1,784.00  ($446.00 per week)

Office utilities:  $  500.00  ($500.00 per month)

Total monthly:  $13,184.00

  x12

Total Annually:  $158,208.00 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The void of a professional weekly news voice in Compton kept residents in the dark on too many issues impacting their welfare. Only an independent source of information could be trusted to deliver objectively-written information on city governance while also providing news on cultural arts and entertainment, and calendar event listings. We believe that Compton will continue to benefit from all these new enterprises. Our readers have grown to trust our editorial thrust and leadership and regularly respond to our news stories in the Editorial section through “Letters to the Herald,” and apprise us of breaking news events, and forthcoming events. The life sustainer of the Compton Herald and challenge over the long haul will be advertising revenue, as the newspaper is distributed free of charge to our readers. But, our fervent belief is that journalistic know-how behind the passionate leadership a 40-year journalism professional and experienced editor, augmented by a savvy business model, will ensure the Compton Herald’s financial viability and sustainability, allowing us to focus and build on the highest standards of journalistic excellence in a community that deserves nothing less.

OUR CURRENT TEAM

The Compton Herald has been pushed head together journalism veterans Publisher, Editor and Founder Jarrette D. Fellows, Jr., a former editor of five newspapers and magazines over the course of 40 years, and a frequent popular guest on the Los Angeles talk TV and radio circuit; Photojournalist Rodney Raschke, a 40-year-plus veteran; Marketing Director Bene Benekwere, formerly a sales executive for Wave Newspapers for 20 years; Dennene Jones, sales and marketing account executive; IT Director Tony Brown, 25-year veteran website and blog innovator; Community relations representatives, Alonzo Williams and Kingsley B. Jones, both local business veterans; and Circulation Manager Jharmaine Fellows. With the exception of our photojournalist, every staffer is a Compton native. Free lance journalists round out the editorial staff. The Herald team is so prolific, it appears to be the work of a staff of 25, rather than only eight. Our campaign goal of $160,000 will truly enable us to build an exemplary 21st century hard copy newspaper and online version.

PLEASE HELP US TO SUCCEED

We need your financial contributions to publish consistently every week for 52 weeks (one year) to achieve Adjudication by the Los Angeles Superior Court. Adjudication will permit the Compton Herald to bid for and receive legal advertising, which will establish a lucrative source of revenue to establish strong sustainability for the Herald. 

We’ve established 10 pledges that will enable you to help us sustain press freedom in Compton, something we are deeply passionate about. Encourage your friends to join you in helping ensure that Compton remains a city where a free press is the cornerstone underscoring the public “right to know.” You will be helping to undergird an institution that will serve the city for decades into this new millennium.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

If you can't contribute financially, there are still ways that you can help support this campaign!

·  Post a link on your Social Media platforms to get the word out to your contacts

·  Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!  ~ Jarrette Fellows, Jr.

CREDITS 

Video filmed and edited byJHAR PRODUCTIONS

 Music: “News Theme” courtesy iMovie Ap

FUNDING PERIOD

March 6, 2015 -April 16, 2015(40 days)

.

story:
I am offering discounts on photo-shoots during 2015.


Our little man: The little old comedian, Kingsley Azopardi

Ik werk nu 's nachts aan design projecten en overdag bouw ik mijn portfolio op en zorg ik voor ons zoontje, dit maakt het lastig om zelf aan het benodigde kapitaal te komen.

Met jouw/jullie hulp kan ik de apparatuur kopen die ik nodig heb en een studio huren voor 4/5 maanden.
Heel erg bedankt! 

I am working nights on projects to raise money and during the day I am building my portfolio and looking after our boy, this makes it difficult to raise extra funds.

With your help I can buy the equipment needed and rent a studio for 4-5 months.

Thank you!


Richard terborg

GOALS OF THIS CAMPAIGN/Doelen van deze campagne:

3300 : Full frame Nikon D810.

2500 : 3 lenses, 12-24mm, 50mm, 85mm Sigma and Nikon.

3100 : Profoto studio/location Light system.

3000 : Studio hire, 3/5 days per week for 4-5 months.


Kingsley Azopardi



Schorem Barbers Rotterdam

Schorem barbers Rotterdam








Men Of Steel Run Rotterdam

story:
ABOUT THE PROJECT

Introducing the Healthy Rabbit - a new café eatery that will have food that tastes great and is great for you! 

My name is Justin and my two favorite things in all the world are traveling and tasty food ... so what could be better than bringing them together? This is exactly what I'll be doing when I open the doors of the Healthy Rabbit this summer.

I have spent 10 years dreaming about and developing a new health-conscience concept for a café eatery. Through extensive travels and working as a cook in many countries I have learned how to prepare tasty dishes that are made out of quality ingredients; the kind of food you feel good about eating! 

The core idea behind the Healthy Rabbit is to deliver a menu that is creative, healthy, and great tasting, and is a place to eat that serves you quickly and is a convenient place to eat for everyone in the family. And guess what?! It’s making its debut here in our small town! Opening in Brantford 2015! 

The Healthy Rabbit will be a small business located on Brant Ave, the oldest street in the city of Brantford and near the city center!

NEEDS AND PERKS

I am reaching out to my community and potential supporters and inviting you to be a part of the Healthy Rabbit.

The building has just been purchased; however I now need your help with the start up costs so I can get up and running. I am trying to raise $40,000 CAD which will help cover the cost of permits, commercial equipment, hardware, start-up inventory, products, renovations, and trade work, etc.

I am using indiegogo because I wanted to make the "Perks" of donating fun for you and me. Come down the Rabbit Hole and lettus Feed U! Check out the right hand-side of the page to pick your perk.

More Info!

Join the Healthy Rabbit revolution: Our Background and Why

Among all the food restaurant chains available in our city and most cities, there are very few options for people to go and eat healthier.  Currently, 40% of the average household’s food budget is spent on eating out, and in these cases, they go to places where it’s fast and convenient but not necessarily healthy.  It’s no secret that about 70% of adults are overweight or obese which often leads to diabetes, heart disease and various other chronic diseases. 

Several years ago, I had a dream to create a new kind of fast food restaurant to serve my family and community. One that busy people could come to for a quick meal or snack and know that everything on the menu is fresh, tasty and most importantly: healthy.

Key items I considered while planning:

  • No weeding through menu items to find one or two healthy options.
  • No worrying what kind of sweeteners and oils are in the dressings, or where the veggies came from. Its going to be as much local as possible.
  • No wondering what the vegetarian, vegan, or gluten-free eater in the group can eat.
  • No driving for miles to town, Its going to be the heart of the city.
  • No worrying about a healthy meal for your children.  A healthy menu the kids will love too!
Working in different countries around the world as a cook I have been gathering ideas and insights as to how cultures eat, thrive and enjoy healthy food together. We want the Healthy Rabbit to grow into your 'go-to' for healthy fast food while catching up with others around the globe who are already experiencing the vitality they deserve by having the availability to choose something better for them and their families.  


More about Our Holistic Plan!

As I was working on healthy food options I wanted to have a holistic approach and bring in some healthy community events too. So last year I sprouted the:

 Brantford Running Series.


Want you to be a part of our team!  If you understand the importance that eating better can have on helping you to live a longer, healthier and a happier life, and you want to contribute to making a difference in how everyone eats, please make a donation to our crowd-funding campaign. Your financial contributions will help to establish Brantford's only health food Café and continue in the effort to educate and provide healthy food to a whole city.

Not only have a heart that serves but a heart that will keep on beating, to bring delicious, healthy food to our present generation and potentially many more to come! together we can!



Here are the shirts we are designing for you if you choose one of the perks listed on the side bar.

story:
Our Dream

You walk into a warm and inviting shop and are instantly greeted by someone with a smile and hello.  You look around and see shelves and refrigerators full of unique and awe inspiring craft beers.  People lounging with friends on a comfy couch have just opened one of the bottles from the fridge while others sit at the bar and enjoy craft beers from the tap.  

Everyone is happy, everyone is smiling, everyone welcomes you in.  Welcome to Last Drop Bottle Shop & Tap Room.  Welcome to the craft beer community. 

About The Shop

The shop will hold approximately 1,000 bottles of craft beer in different styles, tastes, colors, ages, specialties, and alcohol levels.  These beers will comes from all over the world and from right here in our backyard of Orange County, CA.  

Our Tap Room will have many rotating handles of craft beer and snacks will be at the bar, we promise :)

We will hold events like tap take overs, bottle shares, and game nights with food trucks.  We will also host fundraisers and community nights in support of special causes and will partner with many of the local breweries to come up with all sorts of fun stuff to do.  

Our Story

Hi, my name is Jeff Amend.  My wife Jena and I are high school sweet hearts and live in Orange County, California. 

Our life together has been amazing while discovering what we’re passionate about.  We have worked very hard for every penny we’ve earned and are willing to risk everything to make our dreams come true.  We fell in love in high school, were married in 2010, and now are very happy to say we are expecting our first baby in July.

Why We Need Your Support

We have been fortunate enough to raise money from friends we have met in the craft beer community.  But as you can guess, it costs a lot of $$$ to open the doors of a brand new business.  We feel this is the perfect platform for us to raise some of the money we need while spreading the word about who we are and what we’re about.  We will use the funds earned from this campaign to spark the flame (details below), and the money we can raise from additional investors who see this will fuel the fire.  Oh, and there are some awesome perks for those of you who can contribute!!! 

What We Need & What You Get

We’ve set a goal of 40k.  In the unfortunate circumstance that we don’t reach our goal we give you our word that all the perks will be honored.  We will also give updates on our progress and if at the end of our campaign we haven’t raised all the money we hoped for we will state what we plan to do with the funds that we did receive.  Here is how we'll use the money.  

    • Lease deposit. 
    • Lawyer fees for trademarking, licensing, construction contracts, and investor contracts.
    • On Sale Beer License, Conditional Use Permit. 
    • Web development fees. 
    • Graphic designer fees.
    • Perk costs (what we send to you).

The Impact

The Orange County craft beer community deserves a shop like we plan to open up.  We will create great jobs for the local community and plan on opening up more shops down the road.  With the profits we create we will give back to the community and hold many events for all to attend that give back to the people we serve every day. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Hitting our goal won’t get us to the finish line.  We hope to raise more than our goal but we will still need to raise additional capital from investors / partners.  Having a successful campaign will push us in the right direction and hopefully catch the eye of potential investors. 
  • We have overcome many hurdles to get where we are today.  Creating a legitimate business plan, learning the ins-and-outs of running a business, and raising what money we have so far hasn't been easy.  We've heard a lot of "No" but every "No" get's us closer to a "Yes!"
  • Raising enough money to get this shop off the ground is no joke.  We understand how difficult it is to contribute your hard earned money in today's world and we don’t take that lightly.  We assure you that all the money we raise will go straight into this business and we are doing everything in our power to make this business successful. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

The Real Family Reunion is a cultural celebration uniting ALL races, ages and genders under the umbrella of oneness, peace, and love. we seek to unite the community by bridging generational gaps with a day of enlightenment, holistic health, arts, social awareness and fun-filled activities! Everyone is welcome to come out and meet each other from all walks of life, reestablishing values and morals back into our families. We seek to empower the community by providing a platform for local businesses to commerce among one another and local residents. 

We have workshops that include practices such as yoga, meditation and martial arts, while sharing the delightful joy of living a healthy life through consuming natural foods. This is a power-packed event filled with  live performances, motivational speakers, and so much more!!! The children will enjoy this festive day, filled with lively activities; Interactive Puppet show, games, water balloons toss and face painting! A full day of education and entertainment that will be an event to cherish and remember.

What We Need & What You Get

To make this magnificent day possible we are in dire need of your contribution! Our expenses include:  venue rental fees, entertainment, equipment,decorations,  staff and permits. 

The Impact

Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).

  • The first annual event took place in Los Angeles, California on July 8th 2012 gathering over 1,700 attendees reestablishing a sense of unity and togetherness for the community. We received so much positive feedback and appreciation from those who were present. Many attendees went on to create their own community platforms, businesses, connections, friendships and life opportunities while stating that the event was life changing!We seek expand every year. 
  •  Additionally, Community building and supporting local businesses is a key component in our work, as this brings a sense of community empowerment and oneness to the surface. The idea is to restore trust, pride and togetherness to the community, while simply having a joyous time celebrating the beautiful things life has to offer...

Risks & Challenges

Some of the risks and challenges that we face is raising enough funds to support the expenses that it takes to host an event of this magnitude. We are attempting to make a dream reality, and it definitely can come true, however it is going to take community involvement to see and bring about the change that we wish to see.

    Other Ways You Can Help

     You can help us tremendously by Spreading the word, Share this link, or Volunteering equipment, time, and services . Thanks for your support! This movement is not made possible without you!

story:
Aquamist Beverages is a small company in the food and beverages sector. The company was established in 2012 and is based in Harare, Zimbabwe. Our aim is to provide clean and affordable bottled water to Zimbabweans. We have a passion for servicing remote areas with no access to clean water.

Our continent is plagued by droughts and water shortages. This combined with municipalities that have not been able to adequately service our communities, creates health risks with many communities plagued by typhoid and dysentery. We would like to contribute to alleviating the problem by establishing an innovative bottling facility that provides a regular supply of competitively priced water.

We have invested in a factory from which we operate and we have innovative bottling equipment. The next step is to raise funding for our working capital requirements. Through your generosity, we can make our dream of increasing supply of water to remote areas a reality and eventually expand beyond our boarders into the rest of Southern Africa. 

We need USD25 000 for bottles, caps, labels, electricity, labour costs and delivery charges. With our campaign target, we are hoping to optimise production and thus become a sustainable, competitive business that provides clean water at affordable prices. We hope to deliver a certain portion of our production to under-priviledged schools, clinics and orphanages to get more clean water into our communities. Even without reaching our goal, we will still make a difference and with at least 50% of our goal, we can approach a local financial institution which can hopefully match the funds raised through the campaign.

We anticipate challenges related to accessing remote areas due to poorly maintained infrastructure and bridges that have fallen into disrepair.  We plan to deliver water to growth point service centres nearest to the areas we are trying to access, and work with locals to distribute product.

Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign and please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! Any support is greatly appreciated. No amount is too little!!!!

story:
Hello, I'm Michelle Shackelford and I own Perbellus Flower Farm with my husband Andrew Shackelford.  We are a third year, 1/2 acre farm specializing in cut flowers and herbs.  We grow using organic principles and are working towards a more sustainable model via on farm composting and mulching for water conservation.  We provide habitat and food for song birds, butterflies, natural pollinators, and predator insects, as well.

We are hoping to expand our production and offerings this spring to share the beauty of locally grown flowers with as many people as we can.  Last season many flowers went to waste because I had no way to store them.  Flowers will bloom without your consideration, imagine that, and that means it's not always the most ideal time.  There is nothing worse than finding a patch of sunflowers about to bloom on Tuesday when the market isn't until Saturday.  

With a cooler, we can harvest and store those flowers at 38 degrees and they will stay fresh for up to two weeks, depending on the varieties.  Also, we will no longer have to do all of our harvesting at one time.  We can go out each evening and see what's ready to come in.  No longer will I be snipping away into the darkness, swatting mosquitoes.  No longer will I have to lug dozens of buckets with water and flowers, two at a time, through the living room, dining room, down the hallway, into the cool basement, and back up again.  As you can imagine, it gets quite tedious.  

That is where the walk in cooler and the Coolbot come in.  A Coolbot is this great little invention that allows you to use an air conditioner as a cooler.  A regular AC unit can only reach minimum temps of about 60 degrees.  With the Coolbot, you can override that and get it down to 32 degrees.  A typical compressor for a walk in cooler can cost $2,500!   A Coolbot is $299.  An air conditioner with 12,000 BTU output runs around $450.  This combo is just a fraction of the cost of the compressor and uses less energy.

We are hoping to raise $1,750.  This money will go into designing a 8' x 8' room in an existing shed on our property.  We will be building two interior dividing walls and a floor frame to support the spray foam application.  We will then insulate the floor, ceiling, and walls with spray foam insulation, 4 inches thick.  We plan to do all of the work ourselves. We will spend $299 for the Coolbot, $400 to $500 for the ac unit, and approximately $200 for an insulated door.  We will also be doing a bit of electrical work.  Other miscellaneous costs are lumber, wiring, and spray foam installation.  

With your help we will be able to grow our business and also improve our quality of life as farmers. 

 What will you get?  Recognition!  Flowers! Plants!  As a donor, you will receive a shout out, fresh flowers and/or cut flower plants, depending on your level of giving. 

Even if you can't contribute to the campaign you can help us by sharing it with your friends and family.  Indiegogo has share tools that make it very easy to spread the word.

  Help us reach our goal so we can share flowers with Northern Michigan.

Thank you,

Michelle and Andrew Shackelford

Perbellus Flower Farm

story:
Hi! We are Michael and Jessie! We are a quirky couple from Durham, NC wanting to build a business that creates a fun and safe environment for all types of gamers! 
Michael has spent the past 12 years off and on in the gaming and entertainment industry. Since 2010 we have been dreaming of starting our own LAN center. That's when we came up with the idea for GamerESC. After several years of set backs, broken promises and a couple of moves we have finally found a location! All we need is a little help to purchase the systems and games. That's where you guys come in! 
 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $5,000 to purchase multiple consoles, computers, controllers and games. 
PERK 1: Every person who donates $5 or more will automatically be added to our "Founders Club" which will include cheaper rates on gaming time and snacks. 
PERK 2: For every donation of $10 or more you will receive every perk from perk one as well as a GamerESC keydrive that you can use to save your games/mods/etc.
PERK 3: For every donation of $20 or more you will receive every perk from perk one and two as well as a FREE custom made GamerESC t-shirt.
PERK 4:  For every donation of $50 or more you will receive every perk from perk one, two and three PLUS the chance to win a FREE BASE CONSOLE OF YOUR CHOICE!
PERK 5: For every donation of $1000 or more you will receive every perk from perk one, two, three and four PLUS A FREE YEAR OF UNLIMITED GAMiNG!
PERK 6: For a donation of the total $5000 amount or more you will receive every perk from perk one, two, three and four PLUS FREE UNLIMITED GAMING FOR LIFE! 

The Impact

This project has been in the works for years, and we have never been able to get the wheels really spinning. It has been heart breaking at times as we were so close to getting it open.  
We want to build an environment that is a fun and safe space for gamers of all ages. We would host monthly events like tournaments to give gamers a sense of community! 
GamerESC is more than just a business.  Its our life. We enjoy bringing fun and entertainment to the people.  People want a place to hang out with others of similar interests. Parents want a safe place to bring their kids so they do not have to worry about them being anti social or out walking the streets.  We offer an escape that everyone needs at some point.  
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word. Share with friends, Tweet it, Facebook it. Talk to family.  Link to your blogs.  Help us get the word out!
story_txt:
Hi! We are Michael and Jessie! We are a quirky couple from Durham, NC wanting to build a business that creates a fun and safe environment for all types of gamers! Michael has spent the past 12 years off and on in the gaming and entertainment industry. Since 2010 we have been dreaming of starting our own LAN center. That's when we came up with the idea for GamerESC. After several years of set backs, broken promises and a couple of moves we have finally found a location! All we need is a little help to purchase the systems and games. That's where you guys come in!  
 

What We Need & What You Get
We need $5,000 to purchase multiple consoles, computers, controllers and games. PERK 1: Every person who donates $5 or more will automatically be added to our "Founders Club" which will include cheaper rates on gaming time and snacks. PERK 2: For every donation of $10 or more you will receive every perk from perk one as well as a GamerESC keydrive that you can use to save your games/mods/etc.PERK 3: For every donation of $20 or more you will receive every perk from perk one and two as well as a FREE custom made GamerESC t-shirt.PERK 4:  For every donation of $50 or more you will receive every perk from perk one, two and three PLUS the chance to win a FREE BASE CONSOLE OF YOUR CHOICE!PERK 5: For every donation of $1000 or more you will receive every perk from perk one, two, three and four PLUS A FREE YEAR OF UNLIMITED GAMiNG!PERK 6: For a donation of the total $5000 amount or more you will receive every perk from perk one, two, three and four PLUS FREE UNLIMITED GAMING FOR LIFE! 

The Impact
This project has been in the works for years, and we have never been able to get the wheels really spinning. It has been heart breaking at times as we were so close to getting it open.  We want to build an environment that is a fun and safe space for gamers of all ages. We would host monthly events like tournaments to give gamers a sense of community! GamerESC is more than just a business.  Its our life. We enjoy bringing fun and entertainment to the people.  People want a place to hang out with others of similar interests. Parents want a safe place to bring their kids so they do not have to worry about them being anti social or out walking the streets.  We offer an escape that everyone needs at some point.   

Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word. Share with friends, Tweet it, Facebook it. Talk to family.  Link to your blogs.  Help us get the word out!

story:
A Single Solution

Hidra Force Ltd has patented a water turbine for modular in-stream power plants that can be easily deployed within many rivers in the world without affecting the surrounding nature. There’s no need for riverbed or flow modifications as is commonly the case with hydropower. The product offers very high efficiency for power generation, with just 1.5 m/s to 2 m/s required water flow and depth starting from 2 m. That means that the water turbine can be used on most rivers in the world. Real-world testing has been performed under the supervision of the professional advisers of the HEP Group, a national electricity company in Croatia. The Department of Hydrodynamics of the Technical Faculty in Rijeka also proved the very high-power yield of the HF solution.

History and Milestones


Thank You !

story:
Who and What is Merced County News Television

Merced County News Television began on January 1st, 2014 by Matthew and Branislava Gonzales. The goal was simple; deliver more local news and information to the residents of Merced County, California, helping them to understand what our local issues are and highlighting what makes us great! In 2015, Merced County News became a four person partnership between Matthew, Branislava and their two new partners Mario and Diana Perez.

  • Matthew Gonzales is currently a film and TV producer with credits that include S'nitch'd, the 2008 and 2009 Oscars party's at the Beverly Hills Hilton, and numerous concerts including Eddie Money.  He has also produced over 300 TV commercials which have aired on various Comcast cable channels, as well as the major networks. Matthew was a student of both the Los Angeles Recording Workshop and the Los Angeles Film School in 1998. He went on to work with Henry "HenGee" Garcia, Innovative Media, and 25th Precinct Records with Ice T.  Matthew started covering breaking news as a stringer in 2009 for various brokers in the Los Angeles county area before he and his wife moved back to Matthew's hometown of Merced, California in 2010.
  • Branislava Ristic-Gonzales is currently the Director of Human Resources and Operations for a local Merced area company and has been with them for over 4 years. During her spare time she has helped write stories, take photos and help market Merced County News Television to its over 16,000 LIKES on Facebook.
  • Mario Perez has always been a hard worker and has built two of his own successful companies which he still currently owns and runs in Merced, California.
  • Diana Perez was with MCN for over six months as a volunteer writer and photographer before stepping up to the challenges that come with being a partner. Diana is continuing her higher education while not only helping to build MCN TV's english speaking viewer but she has also helped launch our MCN TV News en Espanol. Having run a successful HUD program in Fresno, CA she and her husband moved back to Merced two years ago to start their own businesses as well.

Our Capital Goals and Our Perks!

We need start-up capital and you need some great perks! So here's what we are doing and what you'll get for helping us to get there.

  • We are seeking $10,000 in start-up capital. Of that, $2,500 is going to rebuilding our website into a higher production value content and local news and information website. Our builder/designer will develop and build a mobile app that will integrate seamless into Android and iOS smartphones. Another $4,000 will be invested into two new Mac computers for editing and $3,500 toward insurance and leasing a building.
  • Our Perks include everyone at every funding level. From MCN TV News viewer bumper stickers, MCN viewer polo shirts all the way up to your business's own 30 second fully produced tv commercial.
  • If we are unable to reach our entire goal we will still honor all of our perks first then utilize any remaining capital to help off set the costs of building our website.

Merced Needs News

Merced County, now with well over 280,000 residents needs local news and information.

  • Currently Merced County residents only have a couple of local newspapers which focus mainly on Fresno or Modesto area news. Both of these cities are in different counties and not what Merced County residents want as their primary news.
  • We have built a strong audience of over 16,400 likes on our Facebook and over 35,000 views daily with an age demographic of 24 to 34-year-olds.
  • We hope to open sooner with this capital rather than later but know that for sure Merced County News TV will be on the air and very soon!

story:
Make our dream a reality!

In November 2012, AARTI was formed as a grass roots organization to help establish the Redbud Trail in Butler County.  The Redbud Trail begins at the canal route and is railbanked eastward to Augusta.  Railbanking is a federal law that legally preserves the corridor.  AARTI volunteers have organized work days and rallied support within the community. AARTI is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization.

Now, with the support of AmeriCorps and the Sunflower Foundation, AARTI has the opportunity to help finish the full eight mile trail from Andover to Augusta!

To finish the job, we need your help.

We need to raise $55,000 in matching grant funds by March 6, 2015 to construct the additional eight miles of trail.

Volunteer labor has been secured through the AmeriCorps NCCC program, which will place full-time volunteers in Wichita for 13 weeks this summer working on the trails. This opportunity could make it possible to have a eight mile rail-trail completed by August 2015. The matching grant from the Sunflower Foundation and donations from individuals and businesses like you will help AARTI take advantage of this unprecedented opportunity.

2015 is a year of possibilities for trails in Wichita. On both the east and west sides of town, trail advocates from Andover-Augusta Rail Trail Initiative (AARTI) and partner organization Prairie Travelers  are diligently working to create regional transportation connections that include bicyclists and pedestrians. Their combined efforts could result in a 50 mile designated bikeway stretching from Garden Plain to Augusta. Your financial support brings us closer to that goal.

The Impact

Your contribution helps create a healthier community. Beyond the physical transformation of the space, trails help promote healthy, active lifestyles and build community.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially? No problem. AARTI has ongoing opportunities for volunteers, including monthly trail workdays. Contact aartitrail@gmail.com to find out more.Share this campaign with your contacts using the options provided by Indiegogo or by copying the link above.

You can also donate online through PayPal here.

To learn more about the Prairie Sunset Trail expansion into Wichita, e-mail prairietravelers@yahoo.com or visit http://igg.me/at/prairietravelers.
